trans-unit.source: Note: Because of a required workaround for npm@5 calling npm pack we currently don’t support installing modules (from non-npm registry tarballs), which require a prepublish step (e.g. for transpiling sources). See Homebrew/brew#2820 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 注意：由于 npm@5 调用 npm pack 的必需解决方法，我们当前不支持安装模块（从非npm注册表tarballs安装），这需要一个预发布步骤（例如，用于编译源代码）。有关更多信息，请参见Homebrew / brew＃2820。

trans-unit.source: Note: macOS’s system Python does not provide pip. Follow the pip documentation to install it for your system Python if you would like it.
trans-unit.target: 注意： macOS的系统Python不提供 pip 。如果需要，请按照pip文档为系统Python安装它。

trans-unit.source: Note:options are not allowed in Homebrew/homebrew-core as they are not tested by CI.
trans-unit.target: 注意： option s在Homebrew / homebrew-core中是不允许的，因为CI未对其进行测试。

trans-unit.source: Note::optional and :recommended are not allowed in Homebrew/homebrew-core as they are not tested by CI.
trans-unit.target: 注意：： :optional 和 :recommended 不允许在Homebrew / homebrew-core中使用，因为CI未对其进行测试。

trans-unit.source: Only use strategy when it’s necessary. For example, if livecheck is already using Git for a URL, it’s not necessary to use strategy :git. However, if Git applies to a URL but we need to use PageMatch, it’s necessary to use strategy :page_match.
trans-unit.target: 仅在必要时使用 strategy 。例如，如果livecheck已经使用 Git 作为URL，则不必使用 strategy :git 。但是，如果 Git 适用于URL，但我们需要使用 PageMatch ，则必须使用 strategy :page_match 。

trans-unit.source: Only use the GithubLatest strategy when it’s necessary and correct. Github.com rate limits requests and we try to minimize our use of this strategy to avoid hitting the rate limit on CI or when using brew livecheck --tap on large taps (e.g. homebrew/core). The Git strategy is often sufficient and we only need to use GithubLatest when the “latest” release is different than the newest version from the tags.
trans-unit.target: 仅在必要且正确时才使用 GithubLatest 策略。Github.com设置了速率限制请求，我们会尽量减少使用此策略，以避免达到CI的速率限制，或者在使用 brew livecheck --tap （例如自制/核心）时点击。该 Git 的策略往往是足够的，我们只需要使用 GithubLatest 当“最新”版本比从标签的最新版本不同。

trans-unit.source: Regexes should be made case insensitive, whenever possible, by adding i at the end (e.g. /.../i or %r{...}i). This improves reliability, as the regex will handle changes in letter case without needing modifications.
trans-unit.target: 只要有可能，应通过在末尾添加 i 来使正则表达式不区分大小写（例如 /.../i 或 %r{...}i ）。这提高了可靠性，因为正则表达式无需更改即可处理字母大小写的更改。

trans-unit.source: Regexes should only use a capturing group around the version text. For example, in /href=.*?example-v?(\d+(?:\.\d+)+)(?:-src)?\.t/i, we’re only using a capturing group around the version test (matching a version like 1.2, 1.2.3, etc.) and we’re using non-capturing groups elsewhere (e.g. (?:-src)?).
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式只能在版本文本周围使用捕获组。例如，在 /href=.*?example-v?(\d+(?:\.\d+)+)(?:-src)?\.t/i 中，我们仅在版本测试（匹配像一个版本 1.2 ， 1.2.3 等），我们使用非捕获组的其他地方（如 (?:-src)? ）。

trans-unit.source: Regional, Localized: Any version that isn’t the US English one, when that exists.
trans-unit.target: 区域性，本地化：存在的不是美国英语版本的任何版本。

trans-unit.source: Research available sources to select a URL. Try removing the file name from stable/url, to see if this is a directory listing page. If that doesn’t work, try to find a page that links to the file (e.g. a download page). If it’s not possible to find the newest version on the website, try checking other sources from the formula/cask. When necessary, search for other sources outside of the formula/cask.
trans-unit.target: 研究可用的来源以选择URL。尝试从 stable / url 中删除文件名，以查看这是否是目录列表页面。如果那不起作用，请尝试找到链接到该文件的页面（例如下载页面）。如果无法在网站上找到最新版本，请尝试从配方/酒桶中检查其他来源。必要时，在配方/桶之外搜索其他来源。

trans-unit.source: Run brew update twice and brew doctor (and fix all the warnings) before creating an issue!
trans-unit.target: 创建问题之前，请运行两次 brew update ，并执行 brew doctor （并修复所有警告）！

trans-unit.source: Stable: The latest version provided by the developer defined by them as such.
trans-unit.target: 稳定：开发人员提供的最新版本，由他们定义。

trans-unit.source: Tap
trans-unit.target: Tap

trans-unit.source: Trial: Time-limited version that stops working entirely after it expires, requiring payment to lift the limitation.
trans-unit.target: 试用：限时版本将在到期后完全停止工作，需要付费才能解除限制。

trans-unit.source: Unofficial: An allegedly unmodified compiled binary, by a third-party, of a binary that has no existing build by the owner of the source code.
trans-unit.target: 非官方的：第三方据称未经修改的已编译二进制文件，该二进制文件没有源代码所有者的现有构建。

trans-unit.source: Use [._-] in place of a period/underscore/hyphen between the software name and version in a file name. For a file named example-1.2.3.tar.gz, example[._-]v?(\d+(?:\.\d+)+)\.t will continue matching if the upstream file name format changes to example_1.2.3.tar.gz or example.1.2.3.tar.gz.
trans-unit.target: 使用 [._-] 代替文件名中软件名称和版本之间的句点/下划线/连字符。对于名为 example-1.2.3.tar.gz 的文件，如果上游文件名格式更改为 example_1.2.3.tar.gz ，则 example[._-]v?(\d+(?:\.\d+)+)\.t 将继续匹配。.2.3.tar.gz或 example.1.2.3.tar.gz 。

trans-unit.source: Use \.t in place of \.tgz, \.tar\.gz, etc. There are a variety of different file extensions for tarballs (e.g. .tar.bz2, tbz2, .tar.gz, .tgz, .tar.xz, .txz, etc.) and the upstream source may switch from one compression format to another over time. \.t avoids this issue by matching current and future formats starting with t. Outside of tarballs, we use the full file extension in the regex like \.zip, \.jar, etc.
trans-unit.target: 使用 \.t 代替 \.tgz ， \.tar\.gz 。tar \ .gz等 tbz2 有多种不同的文件扩展名（例如 .tar.bz2 ，tbz2， .tar.gz ， .tgz ， .tar.xz ， .txz 等），并且上游源可能会随时间从一种压缩格式切换为另一种压缩格式。 \.t 通过匹配以 t 开头的当前和将来格式来避免此问题。在压缩包之外，我们在正则表达式中使用完整的文件扩展名，例如 \.zip ， \.jar 等。

trans-unit.source: Use the debug output to understand the situation. brew livecheck --debug <formula>|<cask> provides information about which URLs livecheck tries, any strategies that apply, matched versions, etc.
trans-unit.target: 使用调试输出了解情况。 brew livecheck --debug <formula>|<cask> 提供有关livecheck尝试使用哪些URL，适用的任何策略，匹配版本等信息。

trans-unit.source: Vendorless: A binary distributed without an official website, like a forum posting.
trans-unit.target: Vendorless：没有官方网站（如论坛发帖）分发的二进制文件。

trans-unit.target: 警告！如果您对系统Python 运行 brew install <formula_with_python_bindings> ，则从酿造的Python import <module> ，则Python可能会崩溃（请参阅“ 常见问题”）。如果您决定切换到 pyside Python，请重新安装带有Python绑定的所有公式（例如pyside， wxwidgets ， pygtk ， pygobject ， opencv ， vtk 和 boost-python ）。

Homebrew has the capability to add (and remove) multiple taps to your local installation with the brew tap and brew untap commands. Type man brew in your terminal. The main repository at https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core, often called homebrew/core, is always built-in.

trans-unit.source: A keg_only :versioned_formula should not post_install anything in the HOMEBREW_PREFIX that conflicts with or duplicates the non-versioned counterpart (or other versioned formulae). For example, a node@6 formula should not install its npm into HOMEBREW_PREFIX like the node formula does.

trans-unit.source: A strategy block for Git is a bit different, as the block receives an array of tag strings instead of a page content string. Similar to the PageMatch example, this is converting tags with a date format like 2020-01-01 into 20200101.
trans-unit.target: Git 的 strategy 块有些不同，因为该块接收的是标签字符串数组而不是页面内容字符串。类似于 PageMatch 例子中，这将标签与像日期格式 2020-01-01 到 20200101 。

trans-unit.source: A formula is a package definition written in Ruby. It can be created with brew create <URL> where <URL> is a zip or tarball, installed with brew install <formula>, and debugged with brew install --debug --verbose <formula>. Formulae use the Formula API which provides various Homebrew-specific helpers.
trans-unit.target: 甲式是Ruby编写的包定义。可以使用 brew create <URL> (其中 <URL> 是zip或tarball）创建它，并通过 brew install <formula> 安装，并使用 brew install --debug --verbose <formula> 进行调试。公式使用公式API，该API提供各种特定于Homebrew的帮助器。

trans-unit.target: 一个Git 公式和/或命令存储库

trans-unit.source: A Hash (e.g. =>) adds information to a dependency. Given a String or Symbol, the value can be one or more of the following values:
trans-unit.target: 哈希（例如 => ）将信息添加到依赖项。给定字符串或符号，该值可以是以下值中的一个或多个：

trans-unit.source: A Homebrew analytics user ID, e.g. 1BAB65CC-FE7F-4D8C-AB45-B7DB5A6BA9CB. This is generated by uuidgen and stored in the repository-specific Git configuration variable homebrew.analyticsuuid within $(brew --repository)/.git/config. This does not allow us to track individual users, but does enable us to accurately measure user counts versus event counts. The ID is specific to the Homebrew package manager, and does not permit Homebrew maintainers to e.g. track you across websites you visit.
trans-unit.target: 自制分析用户ID，例如 1BAB65CC-FE7F-4D8C-AB45-B7DB5A6BA9CB 。这是由 uuidgen 生成的，并存储在 $(brew --repository)/.git/config 特定于存储库的Git配置变量 homebrew.analyticsuuid 中。这不允许我们跟踪单个用户，但确实使我们能够准确地衡量用户数量与事件数量之间的关系。该ID特定于Homebrew软件包管理器，不允许Homebrew维护人员在您访问的网站上进行跟踪。

trans-unit.source: A Homebrew analytics user ID, e.g. 1BAB65CC-FE7F-4D8C-AB45-B7DB5A6BA9CB. This is generated by uuidgen and stored in the repository-specific Git configuration variable homebrew.analyticsuuid within $(brew --repository)/.git/config. This does not allow us to track individual users but does enable us to accurately measure user counts vs. event counts (https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/protocol/v1/parameters#cid)
trans-unit.target: 自制分析用户ID，例如 1BAB65CC-FE7F-4D8C-AB45-B7DB5A6BA9CB 。这是由 uuidgen 生成的，并存储在 $(brew --repository)/.git/config 特定于存储库的Git配置变量 homebrew.analyticsuuid 中。这不允许我们跟踪单个用户，但可以使我们准确地衡量用户数量与事件数量（https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/protocol/v1/parameters#cid）

trans-unit.target: 字符串（例如 "jpeg" ）指定公式依赖性。

trans-unit.source: A formula should be deprecated to indicate to users that the formula should not be used and will be disabled in the future. Deprecated formulae should be maintained by the Homebrew maintainers so they can still build from source and their bottles continue to work (even if unmaintained upstream). If this is not possible, they should be disabled.

trans-unit.source: A good example formula for minor conflict is mbedtls, which ships and compiles a “Hello World” executable. This is obviously non-essential to mbedtls’s functionality, and conflict with the popular GNU hello formula would be overkill, so we just remove it during the installation process.

trans-unit.source: A good example formula for minor conflict is mbedtls, which ships and compiles a “Hello World” executable. This is obviously non-essential to mbedtls’s functionality, and conflict with the popular GNU hello formula would be overkill, so we just remove it during the installation process.

Second, it means designing the commands themselves, specifying input parameters and output formats.

trans-unit.source: An executable script for a command named extcmd should be named brew-extcmd. The script itself can use any suitable shebang (#!) line, so an external script can be written in Bash, Ruby, or even Python. Unlike the ruby commands this file must not end with a language-specific suffix (.sh, or .py). This file will be run via exec with some Homebrew variables set as environment variables, and passed any additional command-line arguments.
trans-unit.target: 名为 extcmd 的命令的可执行脚本应命名为 brew-extcmd 。该脚本本身可以使用任何合适的shebang（ #! ）行，因此可以使用Bash，Ruby甚至Python编写外部脚本。与ruby命令不同，此文件不得以特定于语言的后缀（ .sh 或 .py ）结尾。该文件将通过 exec 运行，并将某些Homebrew变量设置为环境变量，并传递任何其他命令行参数。

trans-unit.source: An external command extcmd implemented as a Ruby command should be named brew-extcmd.rb. The command is executed by doing a require on the full pathname. As the command is required, it has full access to the Homebrew “environment”, i.e. all global variables and modules that any internal command has access to. Be wary of using Homebrew internals; they may change at any time without warning.
trans-unit.target: 实现为Ruby命令的外部命令 extcmd 应该命名为 brew-extcmd.rb 。通过对完整路径名执行 require 命令来执行该命令。由于该命令是 require ，因此它具有对Homebrew“环境”的完全访问权限，即，任何内部命令均可访问的所有全局变量和模块。警惕使用Homebrew内部构件；它们可能随时更改而不会发出警告。

trans-unit.source: Another example would be configuration files that should not be overwritten on package upgrades. If after installation you find that to-be-persisted configuration files are not copied but instead symlinked into /usr/local/etc/ from the Cellar, this can often be rectified by passing an appropriate argument to the package’s configure script. That argument will vary depending on a given package’s configure script and/or Makefile, but one example might be: --sysconfdir=#{etc}
trans-unit.target: 另一个示例是在软件包升级时不应覆盖的配置文件。如果在安装后发现未复制的持久配置文件而是从地窖符号链接到 /usr/local/etc/ ，则通常可以通过将适当的参数传递给软件包的configure脚本来纠正此错误。该参数根据给定程序包的配置脚本和/或Makefile的不同而不同，但是一个示例可能是：-- --sysconfdir=#{etc}

trans-unit.source: Apple has assigned this directory for non-system utilities. This means there are no files in /usr/local by default, so there is no need to worry about messing up existing or system tools.
trans-unit.target: Apple已为非系统实用程序分配了此目录。这意味着默认情况下 /usr/local 中没有文件，因此无需担心会弄乱现有的或系统的工具。

trans-unit.source: Applications
trans-unit.target: Applications

trans-unit.source: Applications should be installed into a Python virtualenv environment rooted in libexec. This prevents the app’s Python modules from contaminating the system site-packages and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 应将应用程序安装到以 libexec 为根的Python virtualenv环境中。这样可以防止应用程序的Python模块污染系统站点包，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: Applications should unconditionally bundle all of their Python-language dependencies and libraries and should install any unsatisfied dependencies; these strategies are discussed in depth in the following sections.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序应该无条件地捆绑所有的Python语言依赖和库,并且应该安装任何不满意的依赖;这些策略将在下面的章节中深入讨论。

trans-unit.source: Applications that are compatible with Python 2 should use the Apple-provided system Python in /usr/bin on systems that provide Python 2.7. No explicit Python dependency is needed since /usr/bin is always in PATH for Homebrew formulae.
trans-unit.target: 与Python 2兼容的应用程序应在提供Python 2.7的系统上使用Apple在 /usr/bin 中提供的系统Python。不需要显式的Python依赖关系，因为 /usr/bin 始终位于Homebrew公式的 PATH 中。

trans-unit.source: As Homebrew became primarily a binary package manager, most users were fulfilling Requirements with the default_formula, not with arbitrary alternatives. To improve quality and reduce variation, Homebrew now exclusively supports using the default formula, as an ordinary dependency, and no longer supports using arbitrary alternatives.
trans-unit.target: 随着Homebrew主要成为二进制软件包管理器，大多数用户都使用 default_formula 而不是任意替代方案来满足 Requirement 。为了提高质量并减少变化，Homebrew现在专门支持使用默认公式作为普通的依赖项，并且不再支持使用任意替代方法。

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, conflicts_with should be a last-resort option. It’s a fairly blunt instrument.
trans-unit.target: 通常， conflicts_with 应该是最后一种选择。这是一个相当钝的乐器。

trans-unit.source: As a result, we recommend you give formulae a different name if you want to make them easier to install. Note that there is (intentionally) no way of replacing dependencies of core formulae with those from taps.
trans-unit.target: 因此,如果你想让公式更容易安装,我们建议你给公式起一个不同的名字。请注意,没有办法将核心公式的依赖关系替换为来自tap的依赖关系(故意的)。

trans-unit.source: As far as we can tell it would be impossible for Google to match the randomly generated Homebrew-only analytics user ID to any other Google Analytics user ID. If Google turned evil the only thing they could do would be to lie about anonymising IP addresses and attempt to match users based on IP addresses.
trans-unit.target: 据我们所知,谷歌不可能将随机生成的Homebrew-only分析用户ID与任何其他谷歌分析用户ID进行匹配。如果谷歌变坏,他们唯一能做的就是骗取IP地址的匿名化,并试图根据IP地址匹配用户。

trans-unit.source: Ask for clarification of anything you don’t understand and for help with anything you don’t know how to do.

trans-unit.source: At Homebrew, we like to put the name of the formula up front like so: foobar 7.3 (new formula). This may seem crazy short, but you’ll find that forcing yourself to summarise the commit encourages you to be atomic and concise. If you can’t summarise it in 50-80 characters, you’re probably trying to commit two commits as one. For a more thorough explanation, please read Tim Pope’s excellent blog post, A Note About Git Commit Messages.
trans-unit.target: 在Homebrew，我们喜欢像这样将公式的名称放在前面： foobar 7.3 (new formula) 。这可能看起来很疯狂，但是您会发现，强迫自己总结一下提交会鼓励您保持原子性和简洁性。如果您不能用50-80个字符来概括它，则可能是试图将两次提交作为一次提交。有关更详尽的解释，请阅读Tim Pope的精彩博客文章“ 关于Git提交消息的注释”。

trans-unit.source: Bottles are created using the Brew Test Bot. This happens mostly when people submit pull requests to Homebrew and the bottle do block is updated by maintainers when they brew pull --bottle the contents of a pull request. For the Homebrew organisations’ taps they are uploaded to and downloaded from Bintray.
trans-unit.target: 使用Brew Test Bot创建瓶子。这种情况通常发生在以下情况：人们向 brew pull --bottle 提交拉取请求，并且维护者在冲泡拉装时更新了 bottle do 拉取请求的内容。对于Homebrew组织的水龙头，它们被上传到Bintray或从Bintray下载。

trans-unit.source: Bottles are produced by installing a formula with brew install --build-bottle <formula> and then bottling it with brew bottle <formula>. This outputs the bottle DSL which should be inserted into the formula file.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 brew install --build-bottle <formula> 安装公式，然后使用 brew bottle <formula> 装瓶来生产瓶子。这将输出应插入公式文件中的瓶子DSL。

trans-unit.source: Bottles are simple gzipped tarballs of compiled binaries. Any metadata is stored in a formula’s bottle DSL and in the bottle filename (i.e. macOS version, revision).
trans-unit.target: 瓶子是经过编译的二进制文件的简单压缩压缩包。任何元数据都存储在公式的瓶子DSL和瓶子文件名（即macOS版本，修订版）中。

trans-unit.source: Bottles have a DSL to be used in formulae which is contained in the bottle do ... end block.
trans-unit.target: 瓶子有一个用于 bottle do ... end 配方中的DSL 。

trans-unit.source: Bottles will not be used if the user requests it (see above), if the formula requests it (with pour_bottle?), if any options are specified during installation (bottles are all compiled with default options), if the bottle is not up to date (e.g. lacking a checksum) or if the bottle’s cellar is not :any nor equal to the current HOMEBREW_CELLAR.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户要求使用瓶子（请参见上文），如果公式要求（使用 pour_bottle? ），如果在安装过程中指定了任何选项（瓶子均使用默认选项编译），则不会使用瓶子。日期（例如，缺少校验和），或者瓶子的 cellar 不是 :any 也不等于当前的 HOMEBREW_CELLAR 。

trans-unit.source: But we’d still like for users to enjoy some kind of protection while minimising occurrences of legitimate developers being branded as malware carriers. To do so, we evaluate casks on a case-by-case basis and any user is free to bring a potential malware case to our attention. However, it is important to never forget the last line of defence is always the user.
trans-unit.target: 但是，我们仍然希望用户能享受某种保护，同时最大程度地减少合法开发商被冠以恶意软件载体的烙印。为此，我们会根据具体情况对木桶进行评估，任何用户都可以自由提请我们注意潜在的恶意软件案例。但是，重要的是永远不要忘记最后的防线永远是用户。

trans-unit.source: By default packages that require BLAS/LAPACK linear algebra interfaces should link to OpenBLAS using depends_on "openblas" and passing -DBLA_VENDOR=OpenBLAS to CMake (applies to CMake based formula only) rather than Apple’s Accelerate framework, or the default reference lapack implementation. Apple’s implementation of BLAS/LAPACK is outdated and may introduce hard-to-debug problems. The reference lapack formula is fine, although it is not actively maintained or tuned. For this reason, formulae needing BLAS/LAPACK should link with OpenBLAS.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，需要BLAS / LAPACK线性代数接口的软件包应使用 depends_on "openblas" 链接到OpenBLAS，并将 -DBLA_VENDOR=OpenBLAS 传递给CMake（仅适用于基于CMake的公式），而不是Apple的Accelerate框架或默认的参考lapack实现。苹果公司对BLAS / LAPACK的实现已过时，可能会引入难以调试的问题。尽管没有积极维护或调整参考 lapack 公式，但它很好。因此，需要BLAS / LAPACK的公式应与OpenBLAS链接。

trans-unit.source: By default, brew release will bump the patch version number. Pass --major or --minor to bump the major or minor version numbers, respectively. The command will fail if the previous major or minor release was made less than one month ago.

trans-unit.source: By default, uses shows usage of formula by stable builds.

trans-unit.source: By default, bottles will be built for the oldest CPU supported by the OS/architecture you’re building for (Core 2 for 64-bit OSs). This ensures that bottles are compatible with all computers you might distribute them to. If you really want your bottles to be optimised for something else, you can pass the --bottle-arch= option to build for another architecture; for example, brew install foo --build-bottle --bottle-arch=penryn. Just remember that if you build for a newer architecture some of your users might get binaries they can’t run and that would be sad!
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将为您要为其构建的OS /体系结构所支持的最旧的CPU（针对64位OS的Core 2）来构建Bottle。这样可以确保瓶子与您可能将其分发到的所有计算机兼容。如果您确实希望对瓶子进行其他优化，则可以传递 --bottle-arch= 选项以为其他体系结构进行构建。例如， brew install foo --build-bottle --bottle-arch=penryn 。请记住，如果您为较新的体系结构进行构建，则您的某些用户可能会获得二进制文件，这些二进制文件将无法运行，这将是令人遗憾的！

Just remember that if you build for a newer architecture some of your users might get binaries they can’t run and that would be sad!

trans-unit.source: Casks which do not reach a minimum notability threshold (see Rejected Casks) aren’t accepted in the main repositories because the increased maintenance burden doesn’t justify the poor usage numbers they will likely get. This notability check is performed automatically by the audit commands we provide, but its decisions aren’t set in stone. A cask which fails the notability check can be added if it is:
trans-unit.target: 没有达到最低通知阈值的桶（请参见拒绝的桶）在主存储库中不被接受，因为增加的维护负担并不能证明它们可能会得到的不良使用率。我们提供的审核命令会自动执行此知名度检查，但决不会一成不变。如果满足以下条件，则可以添加未通过知名度检查的酒桶：

trans-unit.source: Casks which use version :latest are also excluded, because we have no way to track the version they’re in. It helps to ask the developers of such software to provide versioned releases (i.e. have the version in the path of the download url).

trans-unit.source: Detailed explanation about why we use Method Signatures and its syntax can be found here. The only extra thing to keep in mind is that we add method signatures to RBI files instead of the actual method definition in the code. This way we preserve the original code structure and everything related to Sorbet is kept within the Library/Homebrew/sorbet directory.
trans-unit.target: 有关为什么使用方法签名及其语法的详细说明，请参见此处。唯一需要记住的是，我们将方法签名添加到RBI文件中，而不是在代码中添加实际的方法定义。这样，我们保留了原始代码结构，并且与Sorbet相关的所有内容都保留在 Library/Homebrew/sorbet 目录中。

trans-unit.source: Detecting whether a setup.py uses setup() from setuptools or distutils is difficult, but we always need to pass this flag to setuptools-based scripts. pip faces the same problem that we do and forces setup() to use the setuptools version by loading a shim around setup.py that imports setuptools before doing anything else. Since setuptools monkey-patches distutils and replaces its setup function, this provides a single, consistent interface. We have borrowed this code and use it in Language::Python.setup_install_args.
trans-unit.target: 检测 setup.py 是使用setuptools还是distutils中的 setup() 是很困难的，但是我们总是需要将此标志传递给基于setuptools的脚本。 pip 面临与我们相同的问题，并通过在 setup.py 周围加载一个垫片来强制 setup() 使用setuptools版本，该垫片在执行其他操作之前会导入setuptools。由于setuptools会修补distutils并替换其 setup 功能，因此这提供了一个一致的接口。我们已经借用了此代码并将其用于 Language::Python.setup_install_args 。

trans-unit.source: Distribute (not to be confused with distutils) is an obsolete fork of setuptools. Distlib is a package maintained outside the standard library which is used by pip for some low-level packaging operations and is not relevant to most setup.py users.
trans-unit.target: 分发（不要与distutils混淆）是setuptools的过时分支。Distlib是在标准库外部维护的软件包，pip使用它来进行一些低级打包操作，并且与大多数 setup.py 用户无关。

trans-unit.source: Distutils and pip use a “flat” installation hierarchy that installs modules as individual files under site-packages while easy_install installs zipped eggs to site-packages instead.
trans-unit.target: Distutils和pip使用“扁平”安装层次结构，该模块将模块作为单独的文件安装在站点软件包下，而 easy_install 则将压缩的鸡蛋安装到站点软件包中。

trans-unit.source: Distutils is a module in the Python standard library that provides developers a basic package management API. Setuptools is a module distributed outside the standard library that extends distutils. It is a convention that Python packages provide a setup.py that calls the setup() function from either distutils or setuptools.
trans-unit.target: Distutils是Python标准库中的模块，可为开发人员提供基本的软件包管理API。Setuptools是在标准库之外分发的模块，用于扩展distutils。按照惯例，Python软件包提供了 setup.py ，该setup.py从distutils或setuptools 调用 setup() 函数。

trans-unit.source: Do brew info python or brew info python@2 for precise information about the paths. Note, a brewed Python still searches for modules in /Library/Python/X.Y/site-packages and also in ~/Library/Python/X.Y/lib/python/site-packages.
trans-unit.target: 做 brew info python 或 brew info python@2 以获得有关路径的精确信息。请注意，经过冲煮的Python仍会在 /Library/Python/X.Y/site-packages 和 ~/Library/Python/X.Y/lib/python/site-packages 。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that no code changes have happened for at least a couple of hours (ideally 4 hours), at least one Homebrew/homebrew-core pull request CI job has completed successfully, checked the state of the Homebrew/brew master CI job (i.e. main jobs green or green after rerunning), and that you are confident there are no major regressions on the current master, branch.
trans-unit.target: 确保至少两个小时（最好是4个小时）内没有代码更改发生，至少一个Homebrew / homebrew-core pull request CI作业已成功完成，检查Homebrew / brew master CI作业的状态（即main作业重新运行后显示为绿色或绿色），并且您有信心当前 master ，分支上没有重大的回归。

trans-unit.source: Ensure you reference any relevant GitHub issue, e.g. Closes #12345 in the commit message. Homebrew’s history is the first thing future contributors will look to when trying to understand the current state of formulae they’re interested in.
trans-unit.target: 确保您引用了任何相关的GitHub问题，例如，提交消息中的 Closes #12345 。自制程序的历史是未来贡献者在试图了解他们感兴趣的公式的当前状态时首先要考虑的事情。

trans-unit.source: Enter an interactive shell for Homebrew’s build environment. Use years-battle-hardened build logic to help your ./configure && make && make install and even your gem install succeed. Especially handy if you run Homebrew in an Xcode-only configuration since it adds tools like make to your PATH which build systems would not find otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 输入Homebrew的构建环境的交互式外壳。使用经过多年抗争的构建逻辑来帮助您进行 ./configure && make && make install ，甚至您的 gem install 都能成功。如果您在仅Xcode的配置中运行Homebrew，则特别方便，因为它会在 PATH 中添加诸如 make 之类的工具，否则构建系统将找不到该工具。

trans-unit.source: Enter the interactive Homebrew Ruby shell.
trans-unit.target: 进入交互式的Homebrew Ruby shell。

trans-unit.source: Even if all criteria are met we may not accept the formula. Documentation tends to lag behind current decision-making. Although some rejections may seem arbitrary or strange they are based on years of experience making Homebrew work acceptably for our users.
trans-unit.target: 即使符合所有标准,我们也可能不接受这个公式。文件往往会落后于当前的决策。虽然有些拒绝可能看起来很武断或奇怪,但它们是基于多年的经验,使Homebrew的工作为我们的用户所接受。

trans-unit.source: Eventually a new version of the software will be released. In this case you should update the url and sha256. If a revision line exists outside any bottle do block and the new release is stable rather than devel, it should be removed.
trans-unit.target: 最终将发布该软件的新版本。在这种情况下，您应该更新 url 和 sha256 。如果在任何 bottle do Block 外部都存在 revision 线，并且新版本稳定而不是开发，则应将其删除。

trans-unit.source: Eventually a new version of the software will be released. In this case you should update the url and sha256. If a revision line exists outside any bottle do block it should be removed.
trans-unit.target: 最终将发布该软件的新版本。在这种情况下，您应该更新 url 和 sha256 。如果任何 bottle do 外部都存在 revision 线，则应将其移除。

trans-unit.source: Every Ruby file in the codebase has a magic # typed: <level> comment at the top, where <level> is one of Sorbet’s strictness levels, usually false, true or strict. The false files only report errors related to the syntax, constant resolution and correctness of the method signatures, but no type errors. Our long-term goal is to move all false files to true and start reporting type errors on those files as well. Therefore, when adding new files, you should ideally mark it with # typed: true and work out any resulting type errors.
trans-unit.target: 代码库中的每个Ruby文件在顶部都有一个神奇的 # typed: <level> 注释，其中 <level> 是Sorbet的严格级别之一，通常为 false ， true 或 strict 。该 false 文件只报告涉及到语法，恒定的分辨率和正确性的方法签名的错误，但没有类型错误。我们的长期目标是将所有 false 文件都转换为 true 文件，并开始报告这些文件的类型错误。因此，添加新文件时，理想情况下应使用 # typed: true 标记它，并找出所有导致的类型错误。

trans-unit.source: Every Ruby file in the codebase is divided into three strictness levels: false, true and strict. The false files only report errors related to the syntax, constant resolution and correctness of the method signatures, and not type errors. We use this file to override strictness on a file-by-file basis. Our longtime goal is to move all false files to true and start reporting type errors on those files as well. If you are making changes that require adding a new ruby file, we would urge you to add it to true and work out the resulting type errors. Read more about Sorbet’s strictness levels here.
trans-unit.target: 代码库中的每个Ruby文件都分为三个严格性级别：错误，正确和严格。该 false 文件只报告涉及到语法，恒定的分辨率和正确性的方法签名的错误，而不是键入错误。我们使用该文件逐个文件地覆盖严格性。我们的长期目标是将所有 false 文件都转换为 true 文件，并开始报告这些文件的类型错误。如果您进行的更改需要添加新的ruby文件，我们敦促您将其添加为 true 并解决导致的类型错误。在此处阅读更多关于Sorbet的严格等级的信息。

trans-unit.source: Files with the .drawio.svg extension are SVG files with embedded draw.io source code. Using that format lends itself to a developer-friendly workflow: it is valid SVG, plays well with git diff and can be edited in lock-step using various online and offline flavours of draw.io. If you use VS Code, you can use an extension for draw.io integration.

trans-unit.source: Finding a Home For Your Cask
trans-unit.target: 为您的木桶寻找一个家

trans-unit.source: First update the formulae and Homebrew itself:
trans-unit.target: 首先更新公式和Homebrew本身。

trans-unit.source: First, check the pull requests in the homebrew-core or linuxbrew-core repositories (whichever apply) to make sure there isn’t already an open PR. You may also want to look through closed pull requests for the formula, as sometimes formulae run into problems preventing them from being updated and it’s better to be aware of any issues before putting significant effort into an update.
trans-unit.target: 首先，检查homebrew-core或linuxbrew-core存储库中的拉取请求（以适用者为准），以确保尚无开放的PR。您可能还需要查看对公式的关闭请求请求，因为有时公式会遇到问题，无法对其进行更新，因此最好在投入大量精力进行更新之前先了解所有问题。

trans-unit.source: First, check to make sure your issue is not listed in the FAQ or Common Issues and can’t otherwise be resolved with the information in the Tips and Tricks documentation. Next, go through the steps in the Troubleshooting guide.
trans-unit.target: 首先，请检查以确保您的问题未在“常见问题解答”或“常见问题”中列出，并且不能通过“技巧和窍门”文档中的信息解决。接下来，按照“故障排除指南”中的步骤进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Firstly, the overall environment in which Homebrew runs is filtered to avoid environment contamination breaking from-source builds (https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/issues/932). In particular, this process filters all but the given whitelisted variables, but allows environment variables prefixed with HOMEBREW_. The specific implementation can be seen in bin/brew.
trans-unit.target: 首先，对运行Homebrew的整个环境进行过滤，以避免环境污染破坏源代码的构建（https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/issues/932）。特别是，此过程将过滤除给定白名单变量之外的所有变量，但允许以 HOMEBREW_ 为前缀的环境变量。具体的实现可以在 bin/brew 中看到。

trans-unit.source: For Python formulae, running brew update-python-resources <formula> will automatically add the necessary resource stanzas for the dependencies of your Python application to the formula. Note that brew update-python-resources is run automatically by brew create if you pass the --python flag. If brew update-python-resources is unable to determine the correct resource stanzas, homebrew-pypi-poet is a good third-party alternative that may help.
trans-unit.target: 对于Python公式，运行 brew update-python-resources <formula> 将自动为公式添加Python应用程序依赖项所需的 resource 节。请注意，如果传递 --python 标志，则 brew create brew update-python-resources 由brew create自动运行。如果 brew update-python-resources 无法确定正确的 resource 节，那么homebrew-pypi-poet是一个很好的第三方替代方案，可能会有所帮助。

trans-unit.source: Formula requiring MPI should use OpenMPI by adding depends_on "open-mpi" to the formula, rather than MPICH. These packages have conflicts and provide the same standardised interfaces. Choosing a default implementation and requiring it to be adopted allows software to link against multiple libraries that rely on MPI without creating un-anticipated incompatibilities due to differing MPI runtimes.
trans-unit.target: 需要MPI的公式应使用OpenMPI，方法是在公式中添加 depends_on "open-mpi" ，而不是MPICH。这些程序包有冲突，并提供相同的标准化接口。选择默认的实现并要求采用它，可使软件链接到依赖MPI的多个库，而不会由于不同的MPI运行时而产生无法预料的不兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Formula requiring MPI should use OpenMPI by adding depends_on "open-mpi" to the formula, rather than MPICH. These packages have conflicts and provide the same standardized interfaces. Choosing a default implementation and requiring it to be adopted allows software to link against multiple libraries that rely on MPI without creating un-anticipated incompatibilities due to differing MPI runtimes.
trans-unit.target: 需要MPI的公式应使用OpenMPI，方法是在公式中添加 depends_on "open-mpi" ，而不是MPICH。这些软件包存在冲突，并提供相同的标准化接口。选择默认实现并要求采用默认实现，可使软件链接到依赖MPI的多个库，而不会由于不同的MPI运行时而导致无法预期的不兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Formulae in the core repository must have a stable version tagged by the upstream project. Tarballs are preferred to Git checkouts, and tarballs should include the version in the filename whenever possible.

trans-unit.source: Formulae that are no longer acceptable in homebrew/core or have been disabled for over a year should be removed.

trans-unit.source: Formulae that declare an unconditional dependency on the "python" formula are bottled against Homebrew’s Python 3.x and require it to be installed.
trans-unit.target: 声明无条件依赖于 "python" 公式的公式会针对Homebrew的Python 3.x装瓶，并要求将其安装。

trans-unit.source: Formulae that declare an unconditional dependency on the "python" or "python@2" formulae are bottled against Homebrew’s Python 3.x or 2.7.x and require it to be installed.
trans-unit.target: 声明对 "python" 或 "python@2" 公式无条件依赖的公式会针对Homebrew的Python 3.x或2.7.x进行瓶装，并要求将其安装。

trans-unit.source: Formulae that depend on versioned formulae must not depend on the same formulae at two different versions twice in their recursive dependencies. For example, if you depend on openssl@1.0 and foo, and foo depends on openssl then you must instead use openssl.
trans-unit.target: 依赖版本化公式的公式的递归依赖性不得两次依赖于两个不同版本的相同公式。例如，如果您依赖 openssl@1.0 和 foo ，而 foo 依赖 openssl ,则必须改为使用 openssl 。

trans-unit.source: From the inception of Homebrew Cask, various requests fell under the umbrella of this reply. Though a somewhat popular request, after careful consideration on multiple occasions we’ve always come back to the same conclusion: we’re not a discoverability service and our users are expected to have reasonable knowledge about the apps they’re installing through us before doing so. For example, grouping casks by categories is not within the scope of the project.
trans-unit.target: 从Homebrew Cask诞生之日起，各种要求就落在了此回复的保护之下。尽管这是一个颇受欢迎的请求，但经过多次仔细考虑后，我们始终会得出相同的结论：我们不是可发现性服务，我们希望用户在使用之前对通过我们安装的应用程序具有合理的了解所以。例如，按类别对木桶进行分组不在项目范围内。

trans-unit.source: GUI apps on macOS don’t have /usr/local/bin in their PATH by default. If you’re on Mountain Lion or later, you can fix this by running sudo launchctl config user path "/usr/local/bin:$PATH" and then rebooting, as documented in man launchctl. Note that this sets the launchctl PATH for all users. For earlier versions of macOS, see this page.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，macOS上的GUI应用程序的 PATH 中没有 /usr/local/bin 。如果您使用的是Mountain Lion或更高版本，则可以通过运行 sudo launchctl config user path "/usr/local/bin:$PATH" 然后重新启动来解决此问题，如 man launchctl 中所述。请注意，这将为所有用户设置launchctl PATH 。对于早期版本的macOS，请参阅此页面。

trans-unit.source: Generate a bottle (binary package) from a formula that was installed with --build-bottle. If the formula specifies a rebuild version, it will be incremented in the generated DSL. Passing --keep-old will attempt to keep it at its original value, while --no-rebuild will remove it.
trans-unit.target: 根据与 --build-bottle 一起安装的公式生成一个瓶子（二进制包）。如果公式指定了重建版本，则它将在生成的DSL中递增。传递 --keep-old 将尝试将其保留为原始值，而 --no-rebuild 会将其移除。

trans-unit.source: Generate a formula for the downloadable file at URL and open it in the editor. Homebrew will attempt to automatically derive the formula name and version, but if it fails, you’ll have to make your own template. The wget formula serves as a simple example. For the complete API, see: http://www.rubydoc.info/github/Homebrew/brew/master/Formula

trans-unit.source: Give your issue a descriptive title which includes the formula name (if applicable) and the version of macOS or Linux you are using. For example, if a formula fails to build, title your issue “<formula> failed to build on <10.x>”, where “<formula>” is the name of the formula that failed to build, and “<10.x>” is the version of macOS or Linux you are using.
trans-unit.target: 给您的问题提供描述性标题，其中包括公式名称（如果适用）以及您使用的macOS或Linux的版本。例如，如果公式生成失败，则将您的问题命名为“ <formula>在<10.x>上构建失败”，其中“ <formula>”是构建失败的公式的名称，而“ <10。 x>”是您使用的macOS或Linux的版本。

trans-unit.source: Giving style and usage feedback on a PR or commit that involves documents is okay and encouraged. But keep in mind that these are just guidelines, and for any change, the author may have made a deliberate choice to break these rules in the interest of understandability or aesthetics.

trans-unit.source: Go to the relevant repository (e.g. https://github.com/Homebrew/brew, https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core, etc.) and create a pull request to request review and merging of the commits in your pushed branch. Explain why the change is needed and, if fixing a bug, how to reproduce the bug. Make sure you have done each step in the checklist that appears in your new PR.
trans-unit.target: 转到相关的库（如https://github.com/Homebrew/brew，https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core等），并创建一个拉请求，要求审查，并在提交的合并您推送的分支。说明为什么需要进行更改，如果要修复错误，则说明如何重现该错误。确保已完成新PR中显示的清单中的每个步骤。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew Cask is not a discoverability service
trans-unit.target: Homebrew Cask不是一个可发现性服务。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew Cask provides a friendly CLI workflow for the administration of macOS applications distributed as binaries.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew Cask 提供了一个友好的 CLI 工作流程,用于管理以二进制文件分发的 macOS 应用程序。

trans-unit.target: 自制外壳完成

trans-unit.source: Homebrew analytics helps us maintainers and leaving it on is appreciated. However, if you want to opt out of Homebrew’s analytics, you can set this variable in your environment:
trans-unit.target: 自制软件分析可帮助我们的维护人员，不胜感激。但是，如果您希望退出Homebrew的分析，则可以在您的环境中设置此变量：

trans-unit.source: Homebrew automatically uninstalls old versions of a formula after that formula is upgraded with brew upgrade, and periodically performs additional cleanup every 30 days.
trans-unit.target: 使用 brew upgrade 升级公式后，Homebrew会自动卸载该公式的旧版本，并每隔30天定期执行一次额外的清除操作。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew build environment that uses years-battle-hardened build logic to help your ./configure && make && make install and even your gem install succeed. Especially handy if you run Homebrew in an Xcode-only configuration since it adds tools like make to your PATH which build systems would not find otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 自制的构建环境，使用经过多年艰苦努力的构建逻辑来帮助您进行 ./configure && make && make install ，甚至您的 gem install 都能成功。如果您在仅Xcode的配置中运行Homebrew，则特别方便，因为它会在 PATH 中添加诸如 make 之类的工具，否则构建系统将找不到该工具。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew can run on 32-bit ARM (Raspberry Pi and others) and 64-bit ARM (AArch64), but no binary packages (bottles) are available. Support for ARM is on a best-effort basis. Pull requests are welcome to improve the experience on ARM platforms.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew可以在32位ARM(Raspberry Pi和其他)和64位ARM(AArch64)上运行,但没有二进制包(瓶)。对ARM的支持是基于尽力而为的。欢迎提出Pull请求,以改善ARM平台上的体验。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew comes with a number of standard test fixtures, including numerous sample images, sounds, and documents in various formats. You can get the file path to a test fixture with test_fixtures("test.svg").
trans-unit.target: Homebrew附带了许多标准测试装置，包括大量的样本图像，声音和各种格式的文档。您可以使用 test_fixtures("test.svg") 获得测试夹具的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew comes with completion definitions for the brew command. Some packages also provide completion definitions for their own programs.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew附带了 brew 命令的完成定义。一些软件包还为自己的程序提供完成定义。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew depends on having an up-to-date version of Xcode because it comes with specific versions of build tools, e.g. clang.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew依赖于Xcode的最新版本，因为它带有特定版本的构建工具，例如 clang 。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew depends on having an up-to-date version of Xcode because it comes with specific versions of build tools, e.g. clang. Installing a custom version of GCC or Autotools into your PATH has the potential to break lots of compiles so we prefer the Apple or Homebrew-provided compilers. Cross-compilers based on GCC will typically be “keg-only” and therefore not linked into your PATH by default, or are prefixed with the target architecture, again to avoid conflicting with Apple or Homebrew compilers.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew依赖于Xcode的最新版本，因为它带有特定版本的构建工具，例如 clang 。在您的 PATH 中安装自定义版本的GCC或Autotools可能会破坏很多编译，因此我们更喜欢Apple或Homebrew提供的编译器。基于GCC的交叉编译器通常是“仅插入”的，因此默认情况下不会链接到您的 PATH 中，或以目标体系结构为前缀，以避免与Apple或Homebrew编译器发生冲突。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew does not currently support 32-bit x86 platforms. It would be possible for Homebrew to work on 32-bit x86 platforms with some effort. An interested and dedicated person could maintain a fork of Homebrew to develop support for 32-bit x86.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew目前不支持32位x86平台。经过一些努力,Homebrew有可能在32位x86平台上运行。有兴趣的人和有心人可以维护Homebrew的分叉,开发对32位x86的支持。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew doesn’t package already-packaged language-specific libraries. These should be installed directly from gem/cpan/pip etc.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew不会打包已经打包的特定语言的库。这些应该直接从 gem / cpan / pip 等安装。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew doesn’t support arbitrary mixing and matching of formula versions, so everything a formula depends on, and everything that depends on it in turn, needs to be upgraded to the latest version as that’s the only combination of formulae we test. As a consequence any given upgrade or install command can upgrade many other (seemingly unrelated) formulae, if something important like python or openssl also needed an upgrade.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew不支持公式版本的任意混合和匹配，因此公式所依赖的所有内容以及与其相关的所有内容都需要升级到最新版本，因为这是我们测试的唯一公式组合。结果，如果像 python 或 openssl 这样重要的东西也需要升级，则任何给定的 upgrade 或 install 命令都可以升级许多其他（看似无关）的公式。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew draws a distinction between Python applications and Python libraries. The difference is that users generally do not care that applications are written in Python; it is unusual that a user would expect to be able to import foo after installing an application. Examples of applications are ansible and jrnl.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew在Python应用程序和Python库之间进行了区分。不同之处在于，用户通常不关心应用程序是用Python编写的；用户期望在安装应用程序后能够 import foo 是不寻常的。应用的实例是 ansible 和 jrnl 。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew draws a distinction between Python applications and Python libraries. The difference is that users generally do not care that applications are written in Python; it is unusual that a user would expect to be able to import foo after installing an application. Examples of applications are ansible and jrnl.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew在Python 应用程序和Python 库之间进行了区分。不同之处在于用户通常不关心应用程序是用Python编写的；用户期望在安装应用程序后能够 import foo 是不寻常的。应用的实例是 ansible 和 jrnl 。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew expects to find manual pages in #{prefix}/share/man/..., and not in #{prefix}/man/....
trans-unit.target: Homebrew希望在 #{prefix}/share/man/... 中找到手册页，而不在 #{prefix}/man/... 中找到手册页。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew formulae should avoid having multiple, separate, upstream projects bundled together in a single package to avoid shipping outdated/insecure versions of software that is already a formula.
trans-unit.target: 自制公式应避免将多个独立的上游项目捆绑在一个包中,以避免运送已经是公式的过时/不安全的软件版本。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew gathers anonymous aggregate user behaviour analytics using Google Analytics. You will be notified the first time you run brew update or install Homebrew. Analytics are not enabled until after this notice is shown, to ensure that you can opt out without ever sending analytics data.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew使用Google Analytics（分析）收集匿名的聚合用户行为分析。首次运行 brew update 或安装Homebrew时，系统将通知您。直到显示此通知后，才能启用分析功能，以确保您可以选择不发送分析数据。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew has begun gathering anonymous aggregate user behaviour analytics and reporting these to Google Analytics. You will be notified the first time you run brew update or install Homebrew.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew已开始收集匿名聚合用户行为分析并将其报告给Google Analytics（分析）。首次运行 brew update 或安装Homebrew 时将通知您。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew has multiple levels of environment variable filtering which affects variables available to formulae.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew有多个级别的环境变量过滤,会影响公式可用的变量。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew has since stopped supporting SHA1 and MD5 entirely. MD5 checksums were removed from core formulae in 2012 and as of April 2015 installing a formula verified by MD5 is actively blocked.
trans-unit.target: 此后，Homebrew不再完全支持SHA1和MD5。2012年从核心公式中删除了MD5校验和，并且自2015年4月起，积极禁止安装由MD5验证的公式。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew installs to the Cellar and then symlinks some of the installation into /usr/local so that other programs can see what’s going on. We suggest you brew ls a few of the kegs in your Cellar to see how it is all arranged.
trans-unit.target: 将Homebrew安装到 Cellar ，然后将一些安装符号链接到 /usr/local ,以便其他程序可以看到发生了什么。我们建议您 brew ls 几个小桶在你的酒窖，看看它是如何全部安排。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew is a poor name, it’s too generic, why was it chosen?
trans-unit.target: 自制是一个不好的名字，它太通用了，为什么选择它？

trans-unit.source: Homebrew is happy to accept applications that are built in Python, whether the apps are available from PyPI or not. Homebrew generally won’t accept libraries that can be installed correctly with pip install foo. Bindings may be installed for packages that provide them, especially if equivalent functionality isn’t available through pip.
trans-unit.target: 无论是否可以从PyPI获得，Homebrew都很乐意接受使用Python构建的应用程序。Homebrew通常不会接受可以通过 pip install foo 正确安装的库。可以为提供绑定的软件包安装绑定，尤其是在pip无法提供等效功能的情况下。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew is installed to a prefix other than the standard /usr/local (although some bottles support this).
trans-unit.target: 将Homebrew安装到标准 /usr/local 以外的前缀（尽管有些瓶子支持此功能）。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew is provided free of charge and run entirely by volunteers in their spare time. As a result, we do not have the resources to do detailed user studies of Homebrew users to decide on how best to design future features and prioritise current work. Anonymous aggregate user analytics allow us to prioritise fixes and features based on how, where and when people use Homebrew. For example:
trans-unit.target: Homebrew是免费提供的,完全由志愿者在业余时间运营。因此,我们没有资源对Homebrew用户进行详细的用户研究,以决定如何最好地设计未来的功能和优先处理当前的工作。匿名的综合用户分析让我们能够根据用户使用Homebrew的方式、地点和时间来确定修复和功能的优先级。比如说

trans-unit.source: Homebrew is the easiest and most flexible way to install the UNIX tools Apple didn’t include with macOS.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew是安装Apple不包含在macOS中的UNIX工具的最简单，最灵活的方法。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew is the easiest and most flexible way to install the UNIX tools Apple didn’t include with macOS. It can also install software not packaged for your Linux distribution to your home directory without requiring sudo.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew是安装Apple不包含在macOS中的UNIX工具的最简单，最灵活的方法。它还可以将未打包用于Linux发行版的软件安装到主目录，而无需 sudo 。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew members will comply with the Software Freedom Conservancy’s conflict of interest policy.
trans-unit.target: 自制软件成员将遵守软件自由保护协会的利益冲突政策。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew members will meet at the annual general meeting (AGM) in a manner determined by the PLC.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew成员将在年度股东大会(AGM)上召开会议,会议方式由PLC决定。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew offers anonymous download strategies.
trans-unit.target: 自家提供匿名下载策略。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew provided a python@2 formula until the end of 2019, at which point it was removed due to the Python 2 deprecation.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew提供了一个 python@2 公式，直到2019年底，由于Python 2弃用，该公式已被删除。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew provides a gcc formula for use with Xcode 4.2+ or when needing C++11 support on earlier versions.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew提供了一个 gcc 公式，可用于Xcode 4.2+或在较早版本上需要C ++ 11支持时使用。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew provides a gcc formula for use with Xcode 4.2+.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew提供了与Xcode 4.2+一起使用的 gcc 公式。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew provides a formula for Python 3.x (python@3.x).
trans-unit.target: Homebrew提供了适用于Python 3.x的公式（ python@3.x ）。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew provides formulae to brew Python 3.x and a more up-to-date Python 2.7.x.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew提供了公式来酝酿Python 3.x和一个更新的Python 2.7.x。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew provides formulae to brew Python 3.x.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew提供公式来酝酿Python 3.x。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew provides helper methods for instantiating and populating virtualenvs. You can use them by putting include Language::Python::Virtualenv at the top of the Formula class definition.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew提供了用于实例化和填充virtualenvs的辅助方法。您可以通过在 Formula 类定义的顶部放置 include Language::Python::Virtualenv 来使用它们。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew provides older GCC formulae, e.g. gcc@7
trans-unit.target: Homebrew提供了较旧的GCC公式，例如 gcc@7

trans-unit.source: Homebrew provides one formula for Python 3.x (python) and another for Python 2.7.x (python@2).
trans-unit.target: Homebrew为Python 3.x（ python ）提供了一个公式，为Python 2.7.x（ python@2 ）提供了另一个公式。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew provides pre-compiled versions for many formulae. These pre-compiled versions are referred to as bottles and are available at https://bintray.com/homebrew/bottles.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew提供了许多公式的预编译版本。这些预编译的版本称为Bottles，可从https://bintray.com/homebrew/bottles获得。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew provides some cross-compilers and toolchains, but these are named to avoid clashing with the default tools, e.g. x86_64-elf-gcc
trans-unit.target: Homebrew提供了一些交叉编译器和工具链，但为避免与默认工具（例如 x86_64-elf-gcc )冲突而命名。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew provides the LLVM Clang, which is bundled with the llvm formula.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew提供了LLVM Clang，它与 llvm 公式捆绑在一起。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew provides two formula DSL methods for launchd plist files:
trans-unit.target: Homebrew提供了两种公式DSL方法用于启动plist文件。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew refuses to work using sudo.
trans-unit.target: 使用sudo,Homebrew拒绝工作。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew should work with any CPython and defaults to the macOS system Python.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew可以与任何CPython一起使用，并且默认为macOS系统Python。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew supports and recommends the latest Xcode and/or Command Line Tools available for your platform (see OS::Mac::Xcode.latest_version and OS::Mac::CLT.latest_version in Library/Homebrew/os/mac/xcode.rb).
trans-unit.target: 自制软件的支持，并建议可用于您的平台的最新Xcode和/或命令行工具（见 OS::Mac::Xcode.latest_version 和 OS::Mac::CLT.latest_version 在 Library/Homebrew/os/mac/xcode.rb ）。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew supports and recommends the latest Xcode and/or Command Line Tools available for your platform (see OS::Mac::Xcode.latest_version and OS::Mac::CLT.latest_version in Library/Homebrew/os/mac/xcode.rb).
trans-unit.target: 自制软件的支持，并建议可用于您的平台的最新Xcode和/或命令行工具（见 OS::Mac::Xcode.latest_version 和 OS::Mac::CLT.latest_version 在 Library/Homebrew/os/mac/xcode.rb ）。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew terminology
trans-unit.target: 自酿术语

trans-unit.source: Homebrew tries to automatically determine the version from the url to avoid duplication. If the tarball has an unusual name you may need to manually assign the version.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew尝试自动从 url 确定 version ，以避免重复。如果压缩包的名称不寻常，则可能需要手动分配 version 。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew understands git, svn, and hg URLs, and has a way to specify cvs repositories as a URL as well. You can test whether the head is being built with build.head?.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew可以理解 git ， svn 和 hg URL，并且还可以将 cvs 存储库指定为URL。您可以测试是否用 build.head? 构建 head 。。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew uses Git for downloading updates and contributing to the project.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew使用Git来下载更新和为项目做贡献。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew wants to maintain a consistent Ruby style across all formulae mostly based on Ruby Style Guide. Other formulae may not have been updated to match this guide yet but all new ones should. Also:
trans-unit.target: Homebrew希望主要根据Ruby Style Guide在所有公式中保持一致的Ruby风格。其他公式可能尚未更新以匹配本指南，但所有新公式都应如此。也：

trans-unit.source: Homebrew will try to guess the formula’s name from its URL. If it fails to do so you can override this with brew create <URL> --set-name <name>.
trans-unit.target: 自制程序将尝试从其URL猜测公式的名称。如果这样做失败，则可以使用 brew create <URL> --set-name <name> 覆盖它。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew’s site-packages directory is first created if (1) any Homebrew formula with Python bindings are installed, or (2) upon brew install python.
trans-unit.target: 如果（1）安装了任何带有Python绑定的Homebrew公式，或者（2）在 brew install python 上，则首先创建Homebrew的 site-packages 目录。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew’s Linux maintainers are Daniel Nachun, Dawid Dziurla, Issy Long, Jonathan Chang, Michka Popoff and Shaun Jackman.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew的Linux维护者是Daniel Nachun，Dawid Dziurla，Issy Long，Jonathan Chang，Michka Popoff和Shaun Jackman。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew’s OpenSSL is keg_only to avoid conflicting with the system so sometimes formulae need to have environment variables set or special configuration flags passed to locate our OpenSSL. You can see this mechanism in the clamav formula. Usually this is unnecessary because Homebrew sets up our build environment to favour finding keg_only formulae first.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew的OpenSSL为 keg_only ,以避免与系统冲突，因此有时公式需要设置环境变量或传递特殊配置标志以定位我们的OpenSSL。您可以在 clamav 公式中看到此机制。通常这是不必要的，因为Homebrew会设置我们的构建环境，以便 keg_only 查找keg_only公式。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew’s OpenSSL is keg_only to avoid conflicting with the system so sometimes formulae need to have environment variables set or special configuration flags passed to locate our OpenSSL. You can see this mechanism in the clamav formula. Usually this is unnecessary because Homebrew sets up our build environment to favour finding keg_only formulae first.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew的OpenSSL为 keg_only ,以避免与系统冲突，因此有时公式需要设置环境变量或传递特殊配置标志以定位我们的OpenSSL。您可以在 clamav 公式中看到此机制。通常这是不必要的，因为Homebrew会设置我们的构建环境，以便 keg_only 查找keg_only公式。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew’s audience includes users with a wide range of education and experience, and users for whom English is not a native language. We aim to support as many of those users as feasible.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew的受众包括具有广泛教育和经验的用户，以及英语不是母语的用户。我们旨在为尽可能多的用户提供支持。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew’s creator @mxcl was too concerned with the beer theme and didn’t consider that the project may actually prove popular. By the time Max realised that it was popular, it was too late. However, today, the first Google hit for “homebrew” is not beer related 😉
trans-unit.target: Homebrew的创建者@mxcl过于关注啤酒主题，并且不认为该项目实际上可能很受欢迎。当Max意识到它很受欢迎时，已经为时已晚。但是，今天，第一个Google搜索的“自制”与啤酒无关😉

trans-unit.source: Homebrew’s default behaviour automatically uninstalls old versions of a formula every 30 days.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew的默认行为是每30天自动卸载旧版本的公式。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew’s pre-built binary packages (known as bottles) of many packages can only be used if you install in the default installation prefix, otherwise they have to be built from source. Building from source takes a long time, is prone to fail, and is not supported. Do yourself a favour and install to the default prefix so that you can use our pre-built binary packages. The default prefix is /usr/local for macOS on Intel, /opt/homebrew for macOS on ARM, and /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew for Linux. Pick another prefix at your peril!
trans-unit.target: 只有在默认安装前缀下安装时，才能使用Homebrew的许多软件包的预构建二进制软件包（称为Bottles），否则必须从源代码构建。从源代码构建需要很长时间，容易失败，并且不受支持。帮个忙，并安装到默认前缀，以便可以使用我们的预建二进制包。对于Intel（对于macOS），默认前缀为 /usr/local ;对于ARM（对于ARM），默认前缀为/ /opt/homebrew ；对于Linux ，默认前缀为 /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew 。选择另一个前缀，后果自负！

trans-unit.source: Homebrew’s versions are not intended to be used for any old versions you personally require for your project. You should create your own tap for formulae you or your organisation wish to control the versioning of or those that do not meet the above standards. Software that has regular API or ABI breaking releases still needs to meet all the above requirements; that a brew upgrade has broken something for you is not an argument for us to add and maintain a formula for you.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew的版本不适用于您个人对项目所需的任何旧版本。您应该为自己或组织希望控制的公式或不符合上述标准的公式创建自己的分接头。具有常规API或ABI最新版本的软件仍需要满足上述所有要求；一个 brew upgrade 打破东西你是不是为我们添加和维护您的公式的参数。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew’s versions should not be used to “pin” formulae to your personal requirements. You should instead create your own tap for formulae you or your organisation wish to control the versioning of, or those that do not meet the above standards. Software that has regular API or ABI breaking releases still needs to meet all the above requirements; that a brew upgrade has broken something for you is not an argument for us to add and maintain a formula for you.
trans-unit.target: 不应使用Homebrew的版本将公式“固定”到您的个人需求。相反，您应该为自己或组织希望控制的版本或不符合上述标准的公式创建自己的分接头。具有常规API或ABI最新版本的软件仍需要满足上述所有要求；一个 brew upgrade 打破东西你是不是为我们添加和维护您的公式的参数。

trans-unit.source: Homebrew, like git(1), supports external commands. These are executable scripts that reside somewhere in the PATH, named brew-cmdname or brew-cmdname.rb, which can be invoked like brewcmdname. This allows you to create your own commands without modifying Homebrew’s internals.
trans-unit.target: 像 git （1）这样的Homebrew 支持外部命令。这些都是可执行的脚本驻留在某处的 PATH ，命名 brew- cmdname 或 brew- cmdname .rb ，可以调用像 brew cmdname 。这使您可以创建自己的命令，而无需修改Homebrew的内部结构。

trans-unit.source: However do yourself a favour and install to /usr/local on macOS Intel, /opt/homebrew on macOS ARM, and /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew on Linux. Some things may not build when installed elsewhere. One of the reasons Homebrew just works relative to the competition is because we recommend installing here. Pick another prefix at your peril!
trans-unit.target: 但是请您帮个忙，并在macOS Intel上安装到 /usr/local ，在macOS ARM上安装到/ /opt/homebrew ，在Linux上安装到 /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew 。在其他地方安装时，某些东西可能无法生成。Homebrew相对于竞争对手而言才有效的原因之一是因为我们建议在此处安装。选择另一个前缀，后果自负！

trans-unit.source: However do yourself a favour and install to /usr/local. Some things may not build when installed elsewhere. One of the reasons Homebrew just works relative to the competition is because we recommend installing to /usr/local. Pick another prefix at your peril!
trans-unit.target: 但是，请帮自己一个忙，并将其安装到 /usr/local 。在其他地方安装时，某些东西可能无法生成。Homebrew只能相对于竞争对手使用的原因之一是因为我们建议安装到 /usr/local 。在危险中再选择一个前缀！

trans-unit.source: However, some updates require additional changes to the formulae. You can look back at previous pull requests to see how others have handled things in the past but be sure to look at a variety of PRs. Sometimes formulae aren’t updated properly, so you may need to use your judgment to determine how to best proceed.
trans-unit.target: 但是，某些更新需要对公式进行其他更改。您可以回顾以前的请求，以了解其他人过去如何处理事情，但请务必查看各种PR。有时公式未正确更新，因此您可能需要根据自己的判断来确定最佳执行方式。

trans-unit.source: If brew doctor still complains about uncommitted modifications, also run this command:
trans-unit.target: 如果 brew doctor 仍然抱怨未提交的修改，请也运行以下命令：

trans-unit.source: If brew said Warning: Version cannot be determined from URL when doing the create step, you’ll need to explicitly add the correct version to the formula and then save the formula.
trans-unit.target: 如果 brew 说明： Warning: Version cannot be determined from URL 在执行 create 步骤时无法从URL确定 version 需要在公式中明确添加正确的版本，然后保存公式。

trans-unit.source: If on or off is passed, turn Homebrew’s analytics on or off respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果 on 或 off 传递，开启或关闭分别家酿的分析。

trans-unit.source: If regenerate-uuid is passed, regenerate UUID used in Homebrew’s analytics.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了 regenerate-uuid ，请重新生成Homebrew分析中使用的UUID。

trans-unit.source: If state is passed, display anonymous user behaviour analytics state. Read more at https://docs.brew.sh/Analytics.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过 state ，则显示匿名用户行为分析状态。在https://docs.brew.sh/Analytics上了解更多信息。

trans-unit.source: If sudo is passed, operate on /Library/LaunchDaemons (started at boot). Otherwise, operate on ~/Library/LaunchAgents (started at login).
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了 sudo ，请在 /Library/LaunchDaemons （在启动时启动）上进行操作。否则，请在 ~/Library/LaunchAgents （从登录开始）上进行操作。

trans-unit.source: If cask is provided, display the location in the Caskroom where cask would be installed, without any sort of versioned directory as the last path.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 cask ，请在Caskroom中显示将安装 cask 的位置，而没有任何版本化目录作为最后路径。

trans-unit.source: If formula are given, upgrade only the specified brews (unless they are pinned; see pin, unpin).
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了 formula 则仅升级指定的冲泡器（除非将其固定；请参见 pin ， unpin ）。

trans-unit.source: If formula is provided, display the file or directory used to cache formula.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 formula ，则显示用于缓存 formula 的文件或目录。

trans-unit.source: If formula is provided, display the location in the Cellar where formula is or would be installed.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 formula ，则在地窖中显示要或将要安装 formula 的位置。

trans-unit.source: If formula is provided, display the location in the Cellar where formula would be installed, without any sort of versioned directory as the last path.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 formula ，请在地窖中显示将要安装 formula 的位置，而没有任何版本化目录作为最后路径。

trans-unit.source: If formula is provided, display the location in the cellar where formula is or would be installed.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 formula ，则在地窖中显示要或将要安装 formula 的位置。

trans-unit.source: If formula is provided, display the location in the cellar where formula would be installed, without any sort of versioned directory as the last path.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 formula ，请在地窖中显示将要安装 formula 的位置，而没有任何版本化目录作为最后路径。

trans-unit.source: If formula is provided, show summary of information about formula.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 formula ，请显示有关 formula 信息的摘要。

trans-unit.source: If formula is provided, summarise the paths within its current keg.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 formula ，则总结其当前桶内的路径。

trans-unit.source: If formula is provided, summarise the paths within its current keg. If cask is provided, list its artifacts.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 formula ，则总结其当前桶内的路径。如果提供了 cask ，请列出其文物。

trans-unit.source: If formula is specified, show summary of information about formula.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 formula ，请显示有关 formula 的信息摘要。

trans-unit.source: If user/repo are provided, display where tap user/repo’s directory is located.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 user / repo ，则显示水龙头 user / repo 的目录。

trans-unit.source: If a URL is specified, the SHA-256 checksum of the new download should also be specified. A best effort to determine the SHA-256 and formula name will be made if either or both values are not supplied by the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 URL ，则还应指定新下载内容的 SHA-256 校验和。如果用户未提供任何一个或两个值，则将尽最大努力确定 SHA-256 和 formula 名称。

trans-unit.source: If a formula or cask is provided, show summary of information about it.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 formula 或 cask ，请显示有关其的信息摘要。

trans-unit.source: If a tag is specified, the Git commit revision corresponding to that tag must also be specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 tag ，则还必须指定与该标签相对应的Git提交 revision 。

trans-unit.source: If a tag is specified, the Git commit revision corresponding to that tag should also be specified. A best effort to determine the revision will be made if the value is not supplied by the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 tag ，则还应指定与该标签对应的Git提交 revision 。如果用户未提供该值，则将尽最大努力确定 revision 。

trans-unit.source: If a version is specified, a best effort to determine the URL and SHA-256 or the tag and revision will be made if both values are not supplied by the user.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 version ，如果用户未同时提供这两个值，则将尽最大努力确定 URL 和 SHA-256 或 tag 和 revision 。

trans-unit.source: If a bottle is available and usable it will be downloaded and poured automatically when you brew install <formula>. If you wish to disable this you can do so by specifying --build-from-source.
trans-unit.target: 如果有可用的瓶子，则在 brew install <formula> 时会自动下载并倒出瓶子。如果要禁用此功能，可以通过指定 --build-from-source 来禁用。

trans-unit.source: If a cask you depend on was removed due to these rules, fear not. Removal of a cask from the official repositories means we won’t support it, but you can do so by hosting your own tap.
trans-unit.target: 如果由于这些规则而移除了您依赖的酒桶，请不要担心。从官方存储库中删除酒桶意味着我们将不支持该酒桶，但您可以通过托管自己的水龙头来做到这一点。

trans-unit.source: If a formula is widely used and is failing often it will enable us to prioritise fixing that formula over others.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个公式被广泛使用,并且经常出现故障,它将使我们能够优先修复该公式而不是其他公式。

trans-unit.source: If a formula that has failed to build is part of a non-core tap or a cask is part of homebrew/cask check those issue trackers instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果构建失败的公式是非核心水龙头的一部分，或者酒桶是自制酒/酒桶的一部分，请改用那些问题跟踪器。

trans-unit.source: If a strategy can be applied, use it to check for new versions.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个策略可以应用,就用它来检查新版本。

trans-unit.source: If a user attempts to install a deprecated formula, they will be shown a warning message but the install will proceed.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户试图安装一个过时的公式,他们将显示一个警告信息,但安装将继续进行。

trans-unit.source: If a user attempts to install a disabled formula, they will be shown an error message and the install will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户试图安装一个禁用的公式,他们将显示一个错误信息,安装将失败。

trans-unit.source: If an app that bundles malware was not signed with an Apple Developer ID and you purposefully disabled or bypassed Gatekeeper, no action will be taken on our part. When you disable security features, you do so at your own risk. If, however, an app that bundles malware is signed, Apple can revoke its permissions and it will no longer run on the computers of users that keep security features on — we all benefit, Homebrew Cask users or not. To report a signed app that bundles malware, use Apple’s Feedback Assistant
trans-unit.target: 如果捆绑了恶意软件的应用程序未使用Apple Developer ID签名，而您故意禁用或绕过Gatekeeper，则我们将不采取任何措施。禁用安全功能时，后果自负。但是，如果对捆绑了恶意软件的应用程序进行了签名，Apple可以撤消其权限，并且它将不再在具有安全功能的用户的计算机上运行-无论我们是否使Homebrew Cask用户受益。要报告捆绑了恶意软件的已签名应用，请使用Apple的反馈助手

trans-unit.source: If anything isn’t clear, you can usually figure it out by grepping the $(brew --repo homebrew/core) directory. Please submit a pull request to amend this document if you think it will help!
trans-unit.target: 如果不清楚，通常可以通过 grep ping $(brew --repo homebrew/core) 目录来解决。如果您认为有帮助，请提交拉取请求以修改此文档！

trans-unit.source: If available, bottled binaries will be used by default except under the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 如果可用,除了在以下条件下,将默认使用瓶装二进制文件。

trans-unit.source: If everything checks out, you’re ready to get started on a new formula!
trans-unit.target: 如果一切顺利，您就可以开始使用新公式了！

trans-unit.source: If installed from a Git clone, the repository directory (i.e. where Homebrew’s .git directory lives).
trans-unit.target: 如果从Git克隆安装，则为存储库目录（即Homebrew的 .git 目录所在的目录）。

trans-unit.source: If it’s been a while, bump it with a “bump” comment. Sometimes we miss requests and there are plenty of them. Maybe we were thinking on something. It will encourage consideration. In the meantime if you could rebase the pull request so that it can be cherry-picked more easily we will love you for a long time.
trans-unit.target: 如果已经有一段时间了，请在“凸起”注释处打翻。有时我们会错过请求，并且有很多请求。也许我们在想什么。它将鼓励考虑。同时，如果您可以重新设置拉取请求的基础，以便可以更轻松地挑选它，我们将长期以来爱您。

trans-unit.source: If it’s hosted outside of GitHub, they have to use brew tap user/repo <URL>, where user and repo will be used to refer to your tap and <URL> is your Git clone URL.

trans-unit.source: If no compilation is involved and there are no :build dependencies, add the line bottle :unneeded since bottles are unnecessary in this case. Otherwise, a bottle block will be added by Homebrew’s CI upon merging the formula’s pull-request.
trans-unit.target: 如果不涉及任何编译，并且不存在 :build 依赖项，则添加 bottle :unneeded 因为在这种情况下不需要瓶。否则，合并公式的拉取请求时，Homebrew的CI将添加一个 bottle 块。

trans-unit.source: If no formula argument is passed, the list of formulae to check is taken from HOMEBREW_LIVECHECK_WATCHLIST or ~/.brew_livecheck_watchlist.
trans-unit.target: 如果未传递任何公式参数， HOMEBREW_LIVECHECK_WATCHLIST 检查的公式列表是从HOMEBREW_LIVECHECK_WATCHLIST或 ~/.brew_livecheck_watchlist 。

trans-unit.source: If no formula or cask argument is passed, the list of formulae and casks to check is taken from HOMEBREW_LIVECHECK_WATCHLIST or ~/.brew_livecheck_watchlist.

trans-unit.source: If set along with HOMEBREW_DEVELOPER, do not use bottles from older versions of macOS. This is useful in development on new macOS versions.
trans-unit.target: 如果与 HOMEBREW_DEVELOPER 一起设置，请不要使用旧版macOS的瓶子。这对于在新的macOS版本上进行开发非常有用。

trans-unit.source: If set, brew install, brew upgrade and brew reinstall will cleanup all formulae when this number of days has passed.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，则在经过此天数后， brew install ， brew upgrade 和 brew reinstall 将清除所有公式。

trans-unit.source: If set, brew install, brew upgrade and brew reinstall will never automatically cleanup installed/upgraded/reinstalled formulae or all formulae every 30 days.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了该选项， brew install ， brew upgrade 和 brew reinstall 将永远不会每30天自动清除已安装/已升级/已重新安装的公式或所有公式。

trans-unit.source: If set, brew install, brew upgrade and brew reinstall will never automatically cleanup installed/upgraded/reinstalled formulae or all formulae every HOMEBREW_CLEANUP_PERIODIC_FULL_DAYS days.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置， brew install ， brew upgrade 和 brew reinstall 将永远不会在 HOMEBREW_CLEANUP_PERIODIC_FULL_DAYS 天后自动清除已安装/已升级/已重新安装的公式或所有公式。

trans-unit.source: If set, brew update only lists updates to installed software.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，则 brew update 仅列出对已安装软件的更新。

trans-unit.source: If set, always assume --debug when running commands.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，则在运行命令时始终假定 --debug 。

trans-unit.source: If set, always assume --verbose when running commands.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，则在运行命令时始终假定 --verbose 。

trans-unit.source: If set, always use Homebrew’s vendored, relocatable Ruby version even if the system version of Ruby is new enough.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，则即使使用Ruby的系统版本足够新，也始终使用Homebrew提供的可重定位的Ruby版本。

trans-unit.source: If set, always use a Homebrew-installed curl(1) rather than the system version. Automatically set if the system version of curl is too old.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，请始终使用Homebrew安装的 curl （1），而不要使用系统版本。如果 curl 的系统版本太旧，则自动设置。

trans-unit.source: If set, always use a Homebrew-installed git(1) rather than the system version. Automatically set if the system version of git is too old.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，请始终使用Homebrew安装的 git （1），而不要使用系统版本。如果 git 的系统版本太旧，则自动设置。

trans-unit.source: If set, always use the latest stable tag (even if developer commands have been run).
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,则始终使用最新的稳定标签(即使已经运行了开发者命令)。

trans-unit.source: If set, disable all use of legacy compatibility code.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,则禁用所有对遗留兼容性代码的使用。

trans-unit.source: If set, do not automatically update before running brew install, brew upgrade or brew tap.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，请在运行 brew install ， brew upgrade 或 brew tap 之前不要自动更新。

trans-unit.source: If set, do not automatically update before running some commands e.g. brew install, brew upgrade and brew tap.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，请在运行某些命令（例如 brew install ， brew upgrade 和 brew tap )之前不要自动更新。

trans-unit.source: If set, do not check for broken dependents after installing, upgrading or reinstalling formulae.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,在安装、升级或重新安装公式后,不检查破损的依赖程序。

trans-unit.source: If set, do not pass --disable when invoking curl(1), which disables the use of curlrc.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，则在调用 curl （1）时不要传递 --disable ，这将禁用 curlrc 的使用。

trans-unit.source: If set, do not print HOMEBREW_INSTALL_BADGE on a successful build.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，请不要在成功的构建中打印 HOMEBREW_INSTALL_BADGE 。

trans-unit.source: If set, do not print text with colour added.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,则不打印添加了颜色的文本。

trans-unit.source: If set, do not send analytics. For more information, see: https://docs.brew.sh/Analytics
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，则不发送分析。有关更多信息，请参见：https : //docs.brew.sh/Analytics

trans-unit.source: If set, do not use Bootsnap to speed up repeated brew calls.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，请不要使用Bootsnap加快重复的 brew 调用。

trans-unit.source: If set, do not use the GitHub API, e.g. for searches or fetching relevant issues after a failed install.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,则不使用GitHub API,例如在安装失败后搜索或获取相关问题。

trans-unit.source: If set, enable runtime typechecking using Sorbet.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,则使用Sorbet启用运行时类型检查。

trans-unit.source: If set, fail on the failure of installation from a bottle rather than falling back to building from source.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,在从瓶子安装失败时失败,而不是从源头上回落到建筑。

trans-unit.source: If set, forbid redirects from secure HTTPS to insecure HTTP.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,禁止从安全的HTTPS重定向到不安全的HTTP。

trans-unit.source: If set, force colour output on non-TTY outputs.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,则强制在非TTY输出端进行彩色输出。

trans-unit.source: If set, pass --verbose when invoking curl(1).
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，则在调用 curl （1）时传递 --verbose 。

trans-unit.source: If set, pass the -A option when calling sudo(8).
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，则在调用 sudo （8）时传递 -A 选项。

trans-unit.source: If set, print install times for each formula at the end of the run.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,在运行结束时打印每个公式的安装时间。

trans-unit.source: If set, refuse to load formulae. This is useful when formulae are not trusted (such as in pull requests).
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,拒绝加载公式。当公式不被信任时,这很有用(比如在拉取请求中)。

trans-unit.source: If set, running Homebrew on Linux will use URLs for macOS. This is useful when merging pull requests for macOS while on Linux.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了,在Linux上运行Homebrew会使用macOS的URLs。这在Linux上合并macOS的拉取请求时很有用。

trans-unit.source: If set, tweak behaviour to be more relevant for Homebrew developers (active or budding) by e.g. turning warnings into errors.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了,则调整行为,使之与Homebrew开发者(活跃的或新兴的)更相关,例如将警告变成错误。

trans-unit.source: If set, use bat for the brew cat command.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，则将 bat 用于 brew cat 命令。

trans-unit.target: 如果已设置，请使用Bootsnap加快重复的 brew 调用。在macOS上使用Homebrew提供的可重定位的Ruby时不要操作（因为它不起作用）。

trans-unit.target: 如果设置，则详细输出将显示 . 每分钟不超过一次。这对于避免长时间运行的Homebrew命令由于无输出而被杀死很有用。

trans-unit.source: If the Node module is also available on the npm registry, we prefer npm hosted release tarballs over GitHub (or elsewhere) hosted source tarballs. The advantages of these tarballs are that they don’t include the files from the .npmignore (such as tests) resulting in a smaller download size and that any possible transpilation step is already done (e.g. no need to compile CoffeeScript files as a build step).
trans-unit.target: 如果Node模块在npm注册表上也可用，我们更喜欢npm托管发行版tarball，而不是GitHub（或其他地方）托管的源tarball。这些tarball的优点是它们不包含来自 .npmignore 的文件（例如测试），从而导致下载大小更小，并且任何可能的编译步骤都已完成（例如，无需编译CoffeeScript文件作为构建步骤） ）。

trans-unit.source: If the bindings are installed by invoking a setup.py, do something like:

trans-unit.target: 如果命令的输出是通过管道发送的，并且未指定外壳，则除非传递 --plain ,否则列表的格式将被格式化以导出到 bash （1）。

trans-unit.source: If the configure script takes a --with-python flag, it usually will not need extra help finding Python.
trans-unit.target: 如果configure脚本带有 --with-python 标志，则通常不需要额外的帮助来查找Python。

trans-unit.source: If the formula already provides a plist file the formula can install it into the prefix like so.
trans-unit.target: 如果公式已经提供了一个plist文件,公式可以像这样把它安装到前缀中。

trans-unit.source: If the formula does not provide a plist you can add a plist using the following stanzas. This will define what the user can run manually instead of the launchd service.
trans-unit.target: 如果公式中没有提供plist,你可以使用下面的句子添加一个plist。这将定义用户可以手动运行的内容,而不是启动d服务。

trans-unit.source: If the formula is a library, compile and run some simple code that links against it. It could be taken from upstream’s documentation / source examples. A good example is tinyxml2, which writes a small C++ source file into the test directory, compiles and links it against the tinyxml2 library and finally checks that the resulting program runs successfully.
trans-unit.target: 如果公式是一个库，请编译并运行一些与其链接的简单代码。可以从上游的文档/源示例中获取。一个很好的例子是 tinyxml2 ，它将一个小的C ++源文件写入测试目录，并根据tinyxml2库对其进行编译和链接，最后检查生成的程序是否成功运行。

trans-unit.source: If the formula is a library, compile and run some simple code that links against it. It could be taken from upstream’s documentation / source examples. A good example is tinyxml2, which writes a small C++ source file into the test directory, compiles and links it against the tinyxml2 library and finally checks that the resulting program runs successfully.
trans-unit.target: 如果公式是一个库，请编译并运行一些与该库链接的简单代码。可以从上游的文档/源示例中获取。一个很好的例子是 tinyxml2 ，它将一个小的C ++源文件写入测试目录，并根据tinyxml2库进行编译和链接，最后检查生成的程序是否成功运行。

trans-unit.source: If the formula is for a GUI program, try to find some function that runs as command-line only, like a format conversion, reading or displaying a config file, etc.
trans-unit.target: 如果是GUI程序的公式,尽量找一些只作为命令行运行的功能,比如格式转换、读取或显示配置文件等。

trans-unit.source: If the preceding steps did not help, it may be appropriate to submit an issue. This can be done by navigating to the relevant repository, clicking the “Issues” link, and clicking on the “New issue” button. When creating an issue, make sure you use the provided template, as it’s important in helping others to understand and potentially triage your issue efficiently.
trans-unit.target: 如果上述步骤没有帮助，则可以提交问题。这可以通过导航到相关的存储库，单击“问题”链接，然后单击“新问题”按钮来完成。创建问题时，请确保使用提供的模板，因为这对于帮助其他人有效地理解和潜在地分类问题很重要。

trans-unit.source: If the software cannot function without credentials or requires a virtual machine, docker instance, etc. to run, a test could be to try to connect with invalid credentials (or without credentials) and confirm that it fails as expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果软件在没有凭证的情况下无法运行,或者需要虚拟机、docker实例等才能运行,可以尝试用无效凭证(或者没有凭证)连接,确认失败后再按预期进行测试。

trans-unit.source: If the software cannot function without credentials or requires a virtual machine, docker instance, etc. to run, a test could be to try to connect with invalid credentials (or without credentials) and confirm that it fails as expected. This is prefered over mocking a dependency.
trans-unit.target: 如果软件在没有凭证的情况下无法运行,或者需要虚拟机、docker实例等才能运行,那么可以尝试用无效凭证(或者没有凭证)连接,并确认是否如预期那样失败。这比嘲讽依赖更可取。

trans-unit.source: If the tool you are attempting to build is pkg-config aware, you can amend your PKG_CONFIG_PATH to find that keg_only utility’s .pc file, if it has them. Not all formulae ship with those files.
trans-unit.target: 如果您尝试构建的工具支持pkg-config，则可以修改 PKG_CONFIG_PATH 来查找 keg_only 实用程序的 .pc 文件（如果有）。并非所有公式都附带这些文件。

trans-unit.source: If there is a formula that currently exists in the Homebrew/homebrew-core repository or has existed in the past (i.e. was migrated or deleted), you can recover it for your own use with the brew extract command. This will copy the desired version of the formula into a custom tap. For example, if your project depends on automake 1.12 instead of the most recent version, you can obtain the automake formula at version 1.12 by running brew extract automake <YOUR_GITHUB_USER>/<YOUR_TAP_REPOSITORY_NAME> --version=1.12. Formulae obtained this way may contain deprecated, disabled or removed Homebrew syntax (e.g. checksums may be sha1 instead of sha256); the brew extract command does not edit or update formulae to meet current standards and style requirements.
trans-unit.target: 如果Homebrew / homebrew-core存储库中当前存在一个公式，或者过去已经存在（即已迁移或删除）该公式，则可以使用 brew extract 命令恢复该公式以供自己使用。这会将所需版本的公式复制到自定义水龙头中。例如，如果你的项目依赖 automake 1.12，而不是最新的版本，你可以得到 automake 运行在1.12版本的配方 brew extract automake <YOUR_GITHUB_USER>/<YOUR_TAP_REPOSITORY_NAME> --version=1.12 。以这种方式获得的公式可能包含不推荐使用，禁用或删除的Homebrew语法（例如，校验和可以是 sha1 而不是 sha256 ）；在 brew extract 该命令不会编辑或更新公式以满足当前的标准和样式要求。

trans-unit.source: If there’s a bottle do block in the formula, don’t remove or change it; we’ll update it when we pull your PR.
trans-unit.target: 如果公式中有 bottle do ，请不要将其删除或更改。我们会在您提取PR时对其进行更新。

trans-unit.source: If these pre-existing reasons do not fit, a custom reason can be specified. These reasons should be written to fit into the sentence <formula> has been deprecated/disabled because it <reason>!.
trans-unit.target: 如果这些先前存在的原因不适合，则可以指定自定义原因。这些原因应该写成适合 <formula> has been deprecated/disabled because it <reason>! 的句子，因为它已被弃用/禁用，因为它<reason>！。
