Running poet some_package will generate the necessary resource stanzas. You can do this like:

trans-unit.source: If you are working on a PR for a single formula, git commit --amend is a convenient way of keeping your commits squashed as you go.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在为单个公式进行PR，那么 git commit --amend 是一种方便的方式，可保持您的提交随身携带。

trans-unit.source: If you do not uninstall all of the versions that Homebrew has installed, Homebrew will continue to attempt to install the newest version it knows about when you run brew upgrade. This can be surprising.
trans-unit.target: 如果您没有卸载Homebrew已安装的所有版本，则Homebrew将继续尝试安装运行 brew upgrade 时知道的最新版本。这可能令人惊讶。

trans-unit.source: If you don’t even want (or can’t) use sudo for bootstrapping local::lib, just manually install local::lib in ~/perl5 and add the relevant path to PERL5LIB before the .bashrc eval incantation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您甚至不想（或不能）使用sudo引导 local::lib ，只需在 ~/perl5 手动安装 local::lib 并在 .bashrc 评估之前添加相关路径到 PERL5LIB 。

trans-unit.source: If you encountered a non-formula problem: upload the output of brew config and brew doctor to a new Gist.
trans-unit.target: 如果遇到非公式问题：将 brew config 和 brew doctor 的输出上载到新的Gist。

trans-unit.source: If you had a formula-related problem: run brew gist-logs <formula> (where <formula> is the name of the formula).
trans-unit.target: 如果您遇到与公式有关的问题：运行 brew gist-logs <formula> （其中 <formula> 是公式的名称）。

trans-unit.target: 如果安装了 bash-completion 公式，这将自动获取补全的初始化脚本（因此您无需遵循警告中的说明）。

trans-unit.source: If you need a formula to be installed from a particular tap, you can use fully qualified names to refer to them.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要从特定的水龙头安装公式,您可以使用完全限定的名称来引用它们。

trans-unit.source: If you need to run Homebrew in a multi-user environment, consider creating a separate user account especially for use of Homebrew.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要在多用户环境下运行Homebrew,可以考虑创建一个单独的用户账户,专门用于使用Homebrew。

trans-unit.source: If you still want to force software to be upgraded via Homebrew Cask, you can:
trans-unit.target: 如果你还想通过Homebrew Cask强制升级软件,你可以。

trans-unit.source: If you upgrade software through it’s built-in mechanism, that happens without Homebrew Cask’s knowledge so both versions get out of sync. If you then upgraded through Homebrew Cask and we have a lower version on the software on record, you’d get a downgrade.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过内置机制来升级软件，则在Homebrew Cask不了解的情况下会发生这种情况，因此这两个版本将不同步。如果您随后通过Homebrew Cask进行了升级，并且我们记录的软件版本较低，那么您将得到降级。

trans-unit.target: 如果要添加一个 option ：

trans-unit.source: If you want your new formula to be part of homebrew/core or want to learn more about writing formulae, then please read the Formula Cookbook.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望新公式成为 homebrew/core 一部分，或者想了解有关编写公式的更多信息，请阅读Formula Cookbook。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to build against custom non-Homebrew dependencies that are provided by Homebrew (e.g. a non-Homebrew, non-macOS ruby) then you must create and maintain your own tap as these formulae will not be accepted in Homebrew/homebrew-core. Once you have done that you can specify env :std in the formula which will allow e.g. which ruby to access your existing PATH variable and allow compilation to link against this Ruby.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望针对Homebrew提供的自定义非Homebrew依赖项进行构建（例如，非Homebrew，非macOS ruby ），则必须创建并维护自己的tap，因为这些公式在Homebrew / homebrew-core中将不被接受。完成后，您可以在公式中指定 env :std ，这将允许例如 which ruby 访问您现有的 PATH 变量，并允许编译与此Ruby链接。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to build against custom non-Homebrew dependencies that are provided by Homebrew (e.g. a non-Homebrew, non-macOS ruby) then you must create and maintain your own tap as these formulae will not be accepted in Homebrew/homebrew-core. Once you have done that you can specify env :std in the formula which will allow e.g. which ruby to access your existing PATH variable and allow compilation to link against this Ruby. You can also include a custom Requirement in your formula that more accurately describes the non-Homebrew software you build against.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望针对Homebrew提供的自定义非Homebrew依赖项进行构建（例如，非Homebrew，非macOS ruby ），则必须创建并维护自己的tap，因为这些公式在Homebrew / homebrew-core中将不被接受。完成后，您可以在公式中指定 env :std ，这将允许例如 which ruby 访问您现有的 PATH 变量，并允许编译针对该Ruby进行链接。您还可以在公式中包含自定义要求，以更准确地描述针对其构建的非Homebrew软件。

trans-unit.source: If you’re still not sure, just commit. We’ll apply some arbitrary rule and make a decision 😉.
trans-unit.target: 如果仍然不确定，请提交。我们将应用一些任意规则并做出决定😉。

trans-unit.source: If you’re curious about the PKG_CONFIG_PATH variable man pkg-config goes into more detail.
trans-unit.target: 如果您对 PKG_CONFIG_PATH 变量感到好奇，请使用 man pkg-config 进行更详细的介绍。

trans-unit.source: If you’re installing an application then use resources for all language-specific dependencies:

trans-unit.source: If you’re starting from scratch, the brew create command can be used to produce a basic version of your formula. This command accepts a number of options and you may be able to save yourself some work by using an appropriate template option like --python.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是从头开始，则 brew create 命令可用于生成公式的基本版本。该命令接受许多选项，您可以使用 --python 这样的适当模板选项来节省一些工作。

trans-unit.source: If you’re stuck, ask for help on GitHub or Homebrew/discussions. The maintainers are very happy to help but we also like to see that you’ve put effort into trying to find a solution first.
trans-unit.target: 如果您遇到困难，请在GitHub或Homebrew / discussions上寻求帮助。维护人员非常乐于提供帮助，但是我们也希望看到您已努力尝试首先找到解决方案。

trans-unit.source: If you’re using an older distribution of Linux, installing your first package will also install a recent version of glibc and gcc. Use brew doctor to troubleshoot common issues.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是旧版Linux，则安装第一个软件包还将安装 glibc 和 gcc 的最新版本。使用 brew doctor 排除常见问题。

trans-unit.source: If you’re using an older distribution of Linux, installing your first package will also install a recent version of glibc and gcc. Use brew doctor to troubleshoot common issues.

trans-unit.source: If you’ve made it this far, congratulations on submitting a Homebrew formula! We appreciate the hard work you put into this and you can take satisfaction in knowing that your work may benefit other Homebrew users as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已经做到了这一点，那么恭喜您提交了Homebrew公式！我们感谢您为此付出的辛勤工作，并且您知道自己的工作也可能会使其他Homebrew用户受益，因此您会感到满意。

trans-unit.source: If your Node module is a native addon or has a native addon somewhere in its dependency tree you have to declare an additional dependency. Since the compilation of the native addon results in an invocation of node-gyp we need an additional build time dependency on "python" (because GYP depends on Python 2.7).
trans-unit.target: 如果您的Node模块是本机插件或在其依赖项树中某处具有本机插件，则必须声明其他依赖项。由于本机插件的编译导致对 node-gyp gyp 的调用，因此我们需要对 "python" 有额外的构建时间依赖关系（因为GYP依赖于Python 2.7）。

trans-unit.source: If your Node module is a native addon or has a native addon somewhere in its dependency tree you have to declare an additional dependency. Since the compilation of the native addon results in an invocation of node-gyp we need an additional build time dependency on "python" (because GYP depends on Python).
trans-unit.target: 如果您的Node模块是本机插件或在其依赖项树中某处具有本机插件，则必须声明其他依赖项。由于本机加载项的编译导致对 node-gyp gyp的调用，因此我们需要对 "python" 有附加的构建时间依赖关系（因为GYP依赖于Python）。

trans-unit.source: If your formula requires being executed with an older Node version you should use one of the versioned node formulae (e.g. node@12).
trans-unit.target: 如果您的公式需要使用较旧的Node版本执行，则应使用版本化的节点公式之一（例如 node@12 ）。

trans-unit.source: If your formula requires being executed with an older Node version you should use one of the versioned node formulae (e.g. node@6).
trans-unit.target: 如果您的公式要求使用较旧的Node版本执行，则应使用版本化的节点公式之一（例如 node@6 ）。

trans-unit.source: If your formulae have the same name as Homebrew/homebrew-core formulae they cannot be installed side-by-side. If you wish to create a different version of a formula that’s in Homebrew/homebrew-core (e.g. with options) consider giving it a different name e.g. nginx-full for more fully-featured nginx formula. This will allow both nginx and nginx-full to be installed at the same time (assuming one is keg_only or the linked files do not clash).
trans-unit.target: 如果您的公式与Homebrew / homebrew-core公式具有相同的名称，则不能并行安装。如果您希望创建位于Homebrew / homebrew-core中的公式的其他版本（例如，带有 option s），请考虑给它使用其他名称，例如 nginx-full ，以使用功能更全的 nginx 公式。这将允许同时安装 nginx 和 nginx-full （假设其中一个是 keg_only 或链接文件不冲突）。

trans-unit.source: If your formulae have the same name as Homebrew/homebrew-core formulae they cannot be installed side-by-side. If you wish to create a different version of a formula that’s in Homebrew/homebrew-core (e.g. with options) consider giving it a different name e.g. nginx-full for more fully-featured nginx formula. This will allow both nginx and nginx-full to be installed at the same time (but not linked if there are conflicts and one of them is not declared to be keg_only).
trans-unit.target: 如果您的公式与Homebrew / homebrew-core公式的名称相同，则不能并行安装。如果您希望创建位于Homebrew / homebrew-core中的公式的其他版本（例如，带有 option s），请考虑给它使用其他名称，例如 nginx-full ，以使用功能更全的 nginx 公式。这将允许同时安装 nginx 和 nginx-full （但如果存在冲突并且其中之一未声明为 keg_only ,则不会链接）。

trans-unit.source: It means the formula is installed only into the Cellar and is not linked into /usr/local. This means most tools will not find it. You can see why a formula was installed as keg-only, and instructions to include it in your PATH, by running brew info <formula>.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着该公式仅安装在地窖中，而未链接到 /usr/local 。这意味着大多数工具都找不到它。您可以通过运行 brew info <formula> 来查看为什么将公式安装为仅桶装，以及将其包含在 PATH 中的说明。

trans-unit.source: It means the formula is installed only into the Cellar; it is not linked into /usr/local. This means most tools will not find it. We don’t do this for stupid reasons. You can still link in the formula if you need to with brew link.

trans-unit.source: Libraries built for Python 3 should include depends_on "python", which will bottle against Homebrew’s Python 3.x. Python 2.x libraries must function when they are installed against either the system Python or brewed Python.
trans-unit.target: 为Python 3构建的库应包含 depends_on "python" ，它将与Homebrew的Python 3.x相对立。针对系统Python或Brewed Python安装Python 2.x库时，它们必须起作用。

trans-unit.source: Libraries built for Python 3 should include depends_on "python@3.x", which will bottle against Homebrew’s Python 3.x. Python 2.x libraries must function when they are installed against either the system Python or brewed Python.
trans-unit.target: 为Python 3构建的库应包含 depends_on "python@3.x" ，它将与Homebrew的Python 3.x形成对立。针对系统Python或Brewed Python安装Python 2.x库时，它们必须起作用。

trans-unit.source: Libraries may be installed to libexec and added to sys.path by writing a .pth file (named like “homebrew-foo.pth”) to the prefix site-packages. This simplifies the ensuing drama if pip is accidentally used to upgrade a Homebrew-installed package and prevents the accumulation of stale .pyc files in Homebrew’s site-packages.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 .pth 文件（命名为“ homebrew-foo.pth”）写入 prefix site-packages，可以将库安装到 libexec 并添加到 sys.path 中。如果 pip 意外用于升级安装了Homebrew的程序包，这可以简化后续操作，并防止在Homebrew的站点程序包中积累陈旧的.pyc文件。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, software which provides both “clean” and malware-infested versions might be removed from the repo — even if we could have access to the good version — if its developers push for users to install the bad version. We do so because in these cases there’s a higher than normal risk that both versions are (or will soon become) compromised in some manner.
trans-unit.target: 同样，软件，同时提供“干净”和恶意软件滋生的版本可能会从回购中删除-即使我们能有机会获得良好的版本-如果开发商推为用户安装的坏版本。我们这样做是因为在这些情况下，两个版本都以某种方式（或将很快成为）受到威胁的风险要比正常情况高。

trans-unit.source: Look through repository history to find the most recent version of formula and create a copy in tap. Specifically, the command will create the new formula file at tap/Formula/formula@version.rb. If the tap is not installed yet, attempt to install/clone the tap before continuing. To extract a formula from a tap that is not homebrew/core use its fully-qualified form of user/repo/formula.
trans-unit.target: 浏览存储库历史记录以查找 formula 最新版本，然后在 tap 中创建一个副本。具体来说，该命令将在 tap /Formula/ formula @ version .rb 上创建新的公式文件。如果尚未安装水龙头，请尝试安装/克隆水龙头，然后再继续。要从非 homebrew/core 的水龙头中提取公式，请使用其完全限定的 user / repo / formula 。

trans-unit.source: Next, you will want to go through the Acceptable Formulae documentation to determine if the software is an appropriate addition to Homebrew. If you are creating a formula for an alternative version of software already in Homebrew (for example, a major/minor version that significantly differs from the existing version), be sure to read the Versions documentation to understand versioned formulae requirements.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，您将要浏览“可接受公式”文档，以确定该软件是否是Homebrew的适当补充。如果要为Homebrew中已经存在的软件的替代版本（例如，主要/次要版本与现有版本明显不同）创建公式，请务必阅读“版本”文档以了解版本化的公式要求。

trans-unit.source: Niche (or self-submitted) stuff
trans-unit.target: 小众(或自荐)的东西。

trans-unit.source: Nilable Types
trans-unit.target: 可置换类型

trans-unit.source: No “$” with environment variables mentioned outside code snippets
trans-unit.target: 在代码段外没有提到带有环境变量的“ $”

trans-unit.source: No “TM”, ™, <sup>SM</sup>, ©, ®, or other explicit indicators of rights ownership or trademarks; we take these as understood when the brand name is mentioned
trans-unit.target: 没有“ TM”，“™”，“ <sup>SM”</sup>，“©”，“®”或其他权利或商标的明确指示；当提及品牌名称时，我们会将其理解为

trans-unit.source: No Oxford commas
trans-unit.target: 无牛津逗号

trans-unit.source: No amendment may be proposed which violates Software Freedom Conservancy policies. The PLC may veto such an amendment by an ordinary resolution.
trans-unit.target: 不得提出违反软件自由保护协会政策的修正案。PLC可通过普通决议否决此类修正案。

trans-unit.source: No configuration is needed if you’re using Homebrew’s fish. Friendly!
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是Homebrew的 fish ,则不需要任何配置。友好的！

trans-unit.source: No configuration is needed in fish. Friendly!
trans-unit.target: fish 不需要任何配置。友好！

trans-unit.source: No more than five versions of a formula (including the main one) will be supported at any given time, regardless of usage. When removing formulae that violate this, we will aim to do so based on usage and support status rather than age.
trans-unit.target: 无论使用情况如何,一个公式(包括主公式)在任何时候都不会支持超过五个版本。在删除违反这一规定的公式时,我们将根据使用情况和支持状态而不是年龄来删除。

trans-unit.source: No more than five versions of a formula (including the non-versioned one) will be supported at any given time, regardless of usage. When removing formulae that violate this we will aim to do so based on usage and support status rather than age.
trans-unit.target: 无论使用情况如何,在任何时候,一个公式(包括非版本的公式)都不会支持超过五个版本。在删除违反这一规定的公式时,我们将根据使用情况和支持状态而不是年龄来删除。

trans-unit.source: No more than two employees of the same employer may serve on the PLC.
trans-unit.target: 同一雇主不得有超过两名雇员担任PLC的成员。

trans-unit.source: No more than two employees of the same employer may serve on the TSC.
trans-unit.target: 同一雇主的雇员不得超过两名。

trans-unit.source: Node for Formula Authors
trans-unit.target: 公式作者节点

trans-unit.source: Node modules should be installed to libexec. This prevents the Node modules from contaminating the global node_modules, which is important so that npm doesn’t try to manage Homebrew-installed Node modules.
trans-unit.target: 节点模块应安装到 libexec 。这样可以防止Node模块污染全局的 node_modules ，这很重要，因此npm不会尝试管理安装了Homebrew的Node模块。

trans-unit.source: Node modules which are compatible with the latest Node version should declare a dependency on the node formula.
trans-unit.target: 与最新节点版本兼容的节点模块应声明对 node 公式的依赖性。

trans-unit.source: Not (yet) working on Apple Silicon.
trans-unit.target: 不(还)在苹果硅。

trans-unit.source: Not all projects have makefiles that will run in parallel so try to deparallelize by adding these lines to the install method:
trans-unit.target: 并非所有项目都具有可并行运行的makefile，因此请尝试通过将以下行添加到 install 方法来取消并行化：

trans-unit.source: Note none of these exceptions is a guarantee for inclusion, but examples of situations where we may take a second look.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这些例外情况都不能保证被收录,而是举例说明我们可能会重新审视的情况。

trans-unit.source: Note on pip install --user
trans-unit.target: 请注意 pip install --user

trans-unit.source: Note that environment variables must have a value set to be detected. For example, export HOMEBREW_NO_INSECURE_REDIRECT=1 rather than just export HOMEBREW_NO_INSECURE_REDIRECT.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，环境变量必须设置为要检测的值。例如， export HOMEBREW_NO_INSECURE_REDIRECT=1 而不是仅 export HOMEBREW_NO_INSECURE_REDIRECT 。

trans-unit.source: Note that environment variables must have a value set to be detected. For example, run export HOMEBREW_NO_INSECURE_REDIRECT=1 rather than just export HOMEBREW_NO_INSECURE_REDIRECT.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，环境变量必须设置为要检测的值。例如，运行 export HOMEBREW_NO_INSECURE_REDIRECT=1 而不是仅 export HOMEBREW_NO_INSECURE_REDIRECT 。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the context of Homebrew, libexec is reserved for private use by the formula and therefore is not symlinked into HOMEBREW_PREFIX.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在Homebrew的上下文中， libexec 保留供公式供私人使用，因此未 HOMEBREW_PREFIX 链接到HOMEBREW_PREFIX。

trans-unit.source: Note that pinned, outdated formulae that another formula depends on need to be upgraded when required as we do not allow formulae to be built against non-latest versions.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,当需要时,需要升级另一个公式所依赖的被钉住的过时公式,因为我们不允许针对非最新版本建立公式。

trans-unit.source: Note that pinned, outdated formulae that another formula depends on need to be upgraded when required, as we do not allow formulae to be built against outdated versions. If this is not desired, you can instead brew extract to maintain your own copy of the formula in a tap.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在需要时，需要升级另一个公式依赖的固定，过时的公式，因为我们不允许针对过时的版本构建公式。如果不希望这样做，您可以 brew extract 以在水龙头中保留自己的配方副本。

trans-unit.source: Note that this will install some other dependencies like Module::Install. Then put the appropriate incantation in your shell’s startup, e.g. for .bash_profile you insert the below, for others see the local::lib docs.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这将安装一些其他依赖项，例如 Module::Install 。然后在外壳程序的启动中添加适当的标记，例如，对于 .bash_profile ,请插入以下内容，其他代码请参见 local::lib 文档。

trans-unit.source: Note that this will install some other dependencies like Module::Install. Then put the appropriate incantation in your shell’s startup, e.g. for .profile you insert the below, for others see the local::lib docs.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这将安装一些其他依赖项，例如 Module::Install 。然后在外壳程序的启动中添加适当的标记，例如，对于 .profile ,请插入以下内容，对于其他内容，请参见 local::lib 文档。

trans-unit.source: Note that values can contain unescaped spaces if you use the multiple-argument form of system.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果您使用 system 的多参数形式，则值可以包含未转义的空格。

trans-unit.source: Note they are largely untested, and as always, be careful about running untested code on your machine.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,它们在很大程度上是未经测试的,和以往一样,在你的机器上运行未经测试的代码时要小心。

trans-unit.source: Note this can also be installed with brew install brew-gem.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这也可以与 brew install brew-gem 一起安装。

trans-unit.source: Note, easy_install is deprecated. We install pip (or pip2 for Python 2) along with python/python2.
trans-unit.target: 注意， easy_install 已过时。我们会同时安装 pip （或 pip2 于Python 2的pip2）以及python / python2。

trans-unit.source: Now (after you restart your shell) cpan or perl -MCPAN -eshell etc. will install modules and binaries in ~/perl5 and the relevant subdirectories will be in your PATH and PERL5LIB etc.
trans-unit.target: 现在（重新启动外壳程序之后）， cpan 或 perl -MCPAN -eshell 等将在 ~/perl5 安装模块和二进制文件，而相关的子目录将位于 PATH 和 PERL5LIB 等中。

trans-unit.source: Now just paste into the formula after __END__. Instead of git diff | pbcopy, for some editors git diff >> path/to/your/formula/foo.rb might help you ensure that the patch is not touched, e.g. white space removal, indentation changes, etc.
trans-unit.target: 现在，只需在 __END__ 之后粘贴到公式中即可。代替 git diff | pbcopy ，对于某些编辑者 git diff >> path/to/your/formula/foo.rb 可能会帮助您确保未触及该补丁，例如，空格删除，缩进更改等。

trans-unit.source: Now that homebrew/versions has been deprecated, homebrew/core supports multiple versions of formulae with a new naming format.
trans-unit.target: 既然不建议使用自酿/版本，则自酿/核心支持具有新命名格式的多个版本的公式。

trans-unit.source: Now you just need to push your commit to GitHub.
trans-unit.target: 现在你只需要把你的提交推送到 GitHub 上。
